abyssal-armor.name: Abyssal Armor
abyssal-armor.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

abyssal-axe.name: Abyssal Axe
abyssal-axe.description: Heavy axe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

abyssal-greaves.name: Abyssal Greaves
abyssal-greaves.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

abyssal-helmet.name: Abyssal Helmet
abyssal-helmet.description: Heavy armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

achlys-razor.name: Achlys Razor
achlys-razor.description: Long katana carried by Judge Achlys's side. It's punctured blade is well suitable for adornment.

acolyte-hood.name: Acolyte Hood
acolyte-hood.description: A dusty hood of a follower of Mammon.

acolyte-robe.name: Acolyte Robe
acolyte-robe.description: A dusty robe of a follower of Mammon.

acolyte-shoes.name: Acolyte Shoes
acolyte-shoes.description: Dusty footwear of a follower of Mammon.

acolyte-staff.name: Acolyte Staff
acolyte-staff.description: A knotted staff of a follower of Mammon.

adamantine-amulet.name: Adamantine Amulet
adamantine-amulet.description: A rare adamantine amulet. Raises attack power.

adamantine-armor.name: Adamantine Armor
adamantine-armor.description: Armor smithed of adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

adamantine-helmet.name: Adamantine Helmet
adamantine-helmet.description: A helmet smithed of adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

adamantine-leggings.name: Adamantine Leggings
adamantine-leggings.description: Leg armor smithed of adamantine. Surely, they will never break.

adamantine-staff.name: Adamantine Staff
adamantine-staff.description: A staff crafted with adamantine. Surely, it will never break.

adamantine.name: Adamantine
adamantine.description: An unbreakable chunk of adamantine. Used to craft extremely durable weapons and armor.

aegis.name: Aegis
aegis.description: An ageless golden shield capable of protecting one from petrification.

aengus-ogs-lute.name: Aengus Og's Lute
aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

affinity-candle.name: Affinity Candle
affinity-candle.description: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time.

agathodaemon-hammer.name: Agathodaemon Hammer
agathodaemon-hammer.description: Deals extra damage and may stun an opponent.

age-old-mimic-head.name: Age-Old Mimic Head
age-old-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items.

aglovale.name: Aglovale
aglovale.description: A full restored resemblance of Aglovale's weapon. Feralia forged this from many memories of the brave knight, who was once lost to the demons of the season. It occasionally grants one greatly increased Arcane ability.

aines-axe.name: Aine's Axe
aines-axe.description: Strike an enemy with the hilt of a weapon, increasing the chance to stun.

aldons-hat.name: Aldon's Hat
aldons-hat.description: The hat of Aldon, the eccentric. Aldon's balance has never faltered, and one cannot be stunned while wearing this hat.

alfar-trinket.name: Alfar Trinket
alfar-trinket.description: A trinket carried by an Alfar. Using it will increase your chances of finding something rarer when opening Stranger's Gifts.

all-seers-gem.name: All-seer's Gem
all-seers-gem.description: An adornment depicting a healthy gazing eye. Adorning it upon a weapon will slightly increase the distance that you can see.

alpha-myrddin-cloak.name: Alpha Myrddin Cloak
alpha-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

alpha-myrddin-cowl.name: Alpha Myrddin Cowl
alpha-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

alpha-myrddin-hood.name: Alpha Myrddin Hood
alpha-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

alpha-myrddin-robe.name: Alpha Myrddin Robe
alpha-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

alpha-myrddin-shield.name: Alpha Myrddin Shield
alpha-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

alpha-myrddin.name: Alpha Myrddin
alpha-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

alpha-olympia-archistaff.name: Alpha Olympia Archistaff
alpha-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

alpha-olympia-boots.name: Alpha Olympia Boots
alpha-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-cowl.name: Alpha Olympia Cowl
alpha-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-cuirass.name: Alpha Olympia Cuirass
alpha-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-garb.name: Alpha Olympia Garb
alpha-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-greaves.name: Alpha Olympia Greaves
alpha-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-helmet.name: Alpha Olympia Helmet
alpha-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-hood.name: Alpha Olympia Hood
alpha-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-shoes.name: Alpha Olympia Shoes
alpha-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-vestment.name: Alpha Olympia Vestment
alpha-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

alpha-olympia-warbow.name: Alpha Olympia Warbow
alpha-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

alpha-olympia-warsword.name: Alpha Olympia Warsword
alpha-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

amadans-staff.name: Amadan's Staff
amadans-staff.description: Deals non-elemental magic damage to all enemies and may suspend an enemy in time.

ambrosia.name: Ambrosia
ambrosia.description: The brew of a terrible witch. It restores a moderate amount of HP and Mana while curing any negative status effects.

amergins-razor.name: Amergin's Razor
amergins-razor.description: Attack from the side, cutting an opponent's defenses and giving Ward for 1 turn.

amulet.name: Amulet
amulet.description: A simple amulet. Slightly raises attack power.

ancient-boots.name: Ancient Boots
ancient-boots.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine pair of boots.

ancient-dark-essence.name: Ancient Dark Essence
ancient-dark-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ancient-earth-essence.name: Ancient Earth Essence
ancient-earth-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ancient-eye.name: Ancient Eye
ancient-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

ancient-fire-essence.name: Ancient Fire Essence
ancient-fire-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ancient-holy-essence.name: Ancient Holy Essence
ancient-holy-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ancient-hood.name: Ancient Hood
ancient-hood.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine hood.

ancient-jinn-staff.name: Ancient Jinn Staff
ancient-jinn-staff.description: Magical staff of a Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.

ancient-lightning-essence.name: Ancient Lightning Essence
ancient-lightning-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ancient-mimic-head.name: Ancient Mimic Head
ancient-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items.

ancient-robe.name: Ancient Robe
ancient-robe.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine robe.

ancient-stone.name: Ancient Stone
ancient-stone.description: An extremely ancient stone. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

ancient-trolls-charm.name: Ancient Troll's Charm
ancient-trolls-charm.description: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.

ancient-water-essence.name: Ancient Water Essence
ancient-water-essence.description: The ancient elves seldomly carried essences to ward off the elements. This item will occasionally grant immunity to its assigned element.

ankh.name: Ankh
ankh.description: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.

ankous-ring.name: Ankou's Ring
ankous-ring.description: A ring crafted for certain slender fingers. It grants protection from the darkness; one cannot fall asleep or become cursed while wearing it.

annwn-rapier.name: Annwn Rapier
annwn-rapier.description: Sparring sword of Gwyn, the former King of Annwn. This weapon can temporarily weaken opponents with ease.

annwn-shotel.name: Annwn Shotel
annwn-shotel.description: A unique curved blade, specifically designed for escaping an opponent's defenses.

antidote-pendant.name: Antidote Pendant
antidote-pendant.description: A pendant utilized by hunters. It protects its wearer from poison.

antlers.name: Antlers
antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

apprentice-hood.name: Apprentice Hood
apprentice-hood.description: Hood worn by a talented student of magic.

apprentice-robe.name: Apprentice Robe
apprentice-robe.description: Robe worn by a talented student of magic.

apprentice-shoes.name: Apprentice Shoes
apprentice-shoes.description: Shoes worn by a talented student of magic.

arc.name: Arc
arc.description: A Greatbow of Annwn, capable of loosing arcane arrows. It can cause a variety of status effects.

arcane-arrows.name: Arcane Arrows
arcane-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

arcane-boots.name: Arcane Boots
arcane-boots.description: The boots of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

arcane-hat.name: Arcane Hat
arcane-hat.description: The hat of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

arcane-robe.name: Arcane Robe
arcane-robe.description: The robe of one who practices rare magic. Slightly raises total mana.

arcane-wand.name: Arcane Wand
arcane-wand.description: Arcane wand of Annwn court wizards. Arcane magic was found to be particularly effective against the forces of Balor.

arch-blessed-rune-armor.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Armor
arch-blessed-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-blessed-rune-helmet.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Helmet
arch-blessed-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-blessed-rune-leggings.name: Arch-Blessed Rune Leggings
arch-blessed-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-gadget.name: Arch-Gadget
arch-gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.

arch-gizmo.name: Arch-Gizmo
arch-gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.

arch-rune-armor.name: Arch-Rune Armor
arch-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-rune-helmet.name: Arch-Rune Helmet
arch-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-rune-leggings.name: Arch-Rune Leggings
arch-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

arch-rune-shield.name: Arch-Rune Shield
arch-rune-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

arena-token.name: Arena Token
arena-token.description: A token permitting access to battle in the Arena.

argent-armor.name: Argent Armor
argent-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

argent-helmet.name: Argent Helmet
argent-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

argent-leggings.name: Argent Leggings
argent-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

argent-shield.name: Argent Shield
argent-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

arisen-ankh.name: Arisen Ankh
arisen-ankh.description: A strange, ancient staff. It seems it can cast spells and also be used as a weapon.

arisen-arch-gadget.name: Arisen Arch-Gadget
arisen-arch-gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their physical or magical defense lowered.

arisen-arch-gizmo.name: Arisen Arch-Gizmo
arisen-arch-gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their dexterity, physical or magical prowess lowered.

arisen-armor.name: Arisen Armor
arisen-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-askr-armor.name: Arisen Askr Armor
arisen-askr-armor.description: Heavy armor of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

arisen-askr-boots.name: Arisen Askr Boots
arisen-askr-boots.description: Boots of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

arisen-askr-cowl.name: Arisen Askr Cowl
arisen-askr-cowl.description: Cowl of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

arisen-askr-garb.name: Arisen Askr Garb
arisen-askr-garb.description: Garb of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

arisen-askr-helmet.name: Arisen Askr Helmet
arisen-askr-helmet.description: Helmet of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

arisen-askr-leggings.name: Arisen Askr Leggings
arisen-askr-leggings.description: Heavy leggings of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

arisen-avalon-armor.name: Arisen Avalon Armor
arisen-avalon-armor.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

arisen-avalon-helmet.name: Arisen Avalon Helmet
arisen-avalon-helmet.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

arisen-avalon-leggings.name: Arisen Avalon Leggings
arisen-avalon-leggings.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

arisen-axe-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Axe of Tiamat
arisen-axe-of-tiamat.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-axe-of-typhon.name: Arisen Axe of Typhon
arisen-axe-of-typhon.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-badb-catha.name: Arisen Badb Catha
arisen-badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-balor-crown.name: Arisen Balor Crown
arisen-balor-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Balor.

arisen-balor-dagger.name: Arisen Balor Dagger
arisen-balor-dagger.description: Dagger often carried as a sidearm by demon soldiers. Has the chance of both burning and causing an opponent to bleed.

arisen-banshee-boots.name: Arisen Banshee Boots
arisen-banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-banshee-robe.name: Arisen Banshee Robe
arisen-banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-banshee-veil.name: Arisen Banshee Veil
arisen-banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-batwing-bow.name: Arisen Batwing Bow
arisen-batwing-bow.description: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.

arisen-bone-shield.name: Arisen Bone Shield
arisen-bone-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

arisen-bonecrusher.name: Arisen Bonecrusher
arisen-bonecrusher.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

arisen-boots.name: Arisen Boots
arisen-boots.description: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-bow-of-scales.name: Arisen Bow of Scales
arisen-bow-of-scales.description: Although the Lizarr seemed untrained in advanced weaponry, these fine bows have been found within their settlements. This bow is enchanted with the power of ice and water.

arisen-bow-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Bow of Tiamat
arisen-bow-of-tiamat.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-bow-of-typhon.name: Arisen Bow of Typhon
arisen-bow-of-typhon.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-candy-cane.name: Arisen Candy Cane
arisen-candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

arisen-caroling-lute.name: Arisen Caroling Lute
arisen-caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

arisen-charons-staff.name: Arisen Charon's Staff
arisen-charons-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

arisen-clurichaun-blade.name: Arisen Clurichaun Blade
arisen-clurichaun-blade.description: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.

arisen-colada.name: Arisen Colada
arisen-colada.description: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.

arisen-contraption.name: Arisen Contraption
arisen-contraption.description: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.

arisen-cowl.name: Arisen Cowl
arisen-cowl.description: Cowl worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-crowsong.name: Arisen Crowsong
arisen-crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.name: Arisen Cursed Aengus Og's Lute
arisen-cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

arisen-cursed-artios-hide.name: Arisen Cursed Artio's Hide
arisen-cursed-artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

arisen-cursed-atepomarus-mail.name: Arisen Cursed Atepomarus Mail
arisen-cursed-atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

arisen-cursed-autumna-crested-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Autumna Crested Shield
arisen-cursed-autumna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-belenuss-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Belenus's Boots
arisen-cursed-belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

arisen-cursed-bormanas-mantle.name: Arisen Cursed Bormana's Mantle
arisen-cursed-bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

arisen-cursed-caticatona-cuirass.name: Arisen Cursed Caticatona Cuirass
arisen-cursed-caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

arisen-cursed-caturixs-robe.name: Arisen Cursed Caturix's Robe
arisen-cursed-caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

arisen-cursed-clotas-garb.name: Arisen Cursed Clota's Garb
arisen-cursed-clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

arisen-cursed-damonas-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Damona's Shield
arisen-cursed-damonas-shield.description: Wet shield of Damona, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Damona was the youngest but bravest of her sisters. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

arisen-cursed-eostres-circlet.name: Arisen Cursed Eostre's Circlet
arisen-cursed-eostres-circlet.description: Circlet of Eostre, warrior Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Eostre protected the fields and crops of Fomoria; crops that would ultimately grow the vessels of Fomoria's curse. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

arisen-cursed-esuss-pillar.name: Arisen Cursed Esus's Pillar
arisen-cursed-esuss-pillar.description: Second staff of Esus, Stone God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Esus constructed the mighty pillars of Fomoria, an architectural delight, truly. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-56e48.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Boots
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-56e48.description: Boots of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-7aefb.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Boots
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-7aefb.description: Boots of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-b2c28.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Boots
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots-b2c28.description: Boots of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Boots
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-boots.description: Boots of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-9a5a1c.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Robe
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-9a5a1c.description: Mail of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-ca4ddb.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Robe
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-ca4ddb.description: Mail of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-d5d338.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Robe
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe-d5d338.description: Mail of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe.name: Arisen Cursed Fomoria Plated Robe
arisen-cursed-fomoria-plated-robe.description: Mail of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-2cb9b4e6.name: Arisen Cursed Fomor's Crown
arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-2cb9b4e6.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-3a4a918b.name: Arisen Cursed Fomor's Crown
arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-3a4a918b.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-612a024c.name: Arisen Cursed Fomor's Crown
arisen-cursed-fomors-crown-612a024c.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-fomors-crown.name: Arisen Cursed Fomor's Crown
arisen-cursed-fomors-crown.description: Crown of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Gobannos' Heavy Boots
arisen-cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

arisen-cursed-goibhniu-armguard.name: Arisen Cursed Goibhniu Armguard
arisen-cursed-goibhniu-armguard.description: Armguard of Goibhniu, warrior smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Goibhniu crafted the house's mighty swords, hammers, and axes. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

arisen-cursed-imonas-slippers.name: Arisen Cursed Imona's Slippers
arisen-cursed-imonas-slippers.description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

arisen-cursed-leros-hood.name: Arisen Cursed Lero's Hood
arisen-cursed-leros-hood.description: Hood of Lero, apprentice God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Lero, untrained, youthful, and rather brash, was quick to fall during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

arisen-cursed-mullos-blinders.name: Arisen Cursed Mullo's Blinders
arisen-cursed-mullos-blinders.description: Blinders often used by Mullo, horse God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Mullo, of three siblings, spent his days taming wild horses. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

arisen-cursed-niskus-boots.name: Arisen Cursed Niskus' Boots
arisen-cursed-niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traiter to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

arisen-cursed-nocturna-crested-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Nocturna Crested Shield
arisen-cursed-nocturna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.name: Arisen Cursed Ogmios' Satin Robe
arisen-cursed-ogmios-satin-robe.description: Soft robe of Ogmios, eloquence God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

arisen-cursed-sabrinas-cowl.name: Arisen Cursed Sabrina's Cowl
arisen-cursed-sabrinas-cowl.description: Headwear of Sabrina, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Sabrina and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

arisen-cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.name: Arisen Cursed Sequana's Chestpiece
arisen-cursed-sequanas-chestpiece.description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

arisen-cursed-sumner-crested-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Sumner Crested Shield
arisen-cursed-sumner-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-cursed-wintara-crested-shield.name: Arisen Cursed Wintara Crested Shield
arisen-cursed-wintara-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

arisen-dagda-armor.name: Arisen Dagda Armor
arisen-dagda-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-boots.name: Arisen Dagda Boots
arisen-dagda-boots.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-cowl.name: Arisen Dagda Cowl
arisen-dagda-cowl.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-garb.name: Arisen Dagda Garb
arisen-dagda-garb.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-helmet.name: Arisen Dagda Helmet
arisen-dagda-helmet.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-hood.name: Arisen Dagda Hood
arisen-dagda-hood.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-leggings.name: Arisen Dagda Leggings
arisen-dagda-leggings.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-robe.name: Arisen Dagda Robe
arisen-dagda-robe.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-dagda-shoes.name: Arisen Dagda Shoes
arisen-dagda-shoes.description: Armor forged of the remains of Dagda, a Balor demon. With Dagda's self healing power, healing items will restore additional HP and mana.

arisen-deathbringer.name: Arisen Deathbringer
arisen-deathbringer.description: Blade taken from Ankou's deadly scythe. Increases orns and experience earned.

arisen-demeters-halberd.name: Arisen Demeter's Halberd
arisen-demeters-halberd.description: The contorted pole-arm of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

arisen-demeters-staff.name: Arisen Demeter's Staff
arisen-demeters-staff.description: The contorted staff of Demeter. Demeter created the Earthen Legion to restore and maintain balance to this world after the falling. Unfortunately, their fate came long before any notion of normality.

arisen-draconian-archistaff.name: Arisen Draconian Archistaff
arisen-draconian-archistaff.description: An archistaff granted to Draconian lords. Illuminates your path while carried.

arisen-embla-hood.name: Arisen Embla Hood
arisen-embla-hood.description: Hood of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

arisen-embla-robe.name: Arisen Embla Robe
arisen-embla-robe.description: Robe of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

arisen-embla-shoes.name: Arisen Embla Shoes
arisen-embla-shoes.description: Shoes of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

arisen-fairys-ring.name: Arisen Fairy's Ring
arisen-fairys-ring.description: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.

arisen-fairys-tanto.name: Arisen Fairy's Tanto
arisen-fairys-tanto.description: Attack with a chance of causing poison.

arisen-fairys-wand.name: Arisen Fairy's Wand
arisen-fairys-wand.description: A curious wand carried by the foul Naggeneen. Spells cast with this wand may cause your opponent to become poisoned or blighted.

arisen-feral-archistaff.name: Arisen Feral Archistaff
arisen-feral-archistaff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the feral Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

arisen-feral-claws.name: Arisen Feral Claws
arisen-feral-claws.description: Attack the opponent with unrelenting fury.

arisen-feral-hood.name: Arisen Feral Hood
arisen-feral-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the power of your follower.

arisen-feral-warsword.name: Arisen Feral Warsword
arisen-feral-warsword.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

arisen-fey-badb-catha.name: Arisen Fey Badb Catha
arisen-fey-badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-fey-banshee-boots.name: Arisen Fey Banshee Boots
arisen-fey-banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-banshee-robe.name: Arisen Fey Banshee Robe
arisen-fey-banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-banshee-veil.name: Arisen Fey Banshee Veil
arisen-fey-banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-crowsong.name: Arisen Fey Crowsong
arisen-fey-crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-fey-macha-pillar.name: Arisen Fey Macha Pillar
arisen-fey-macha-pillar.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-fey-neman-havoc.name: Arisen Fey Neman Havoc
arisen-fey-neman-havoc.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-fey-plagued-cuirass.name: Arisen Fey Plagued Cuirass
arisen-fey-plagued-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-plagued-greaves.name: Arisen Fey Plagued Greaves
arisen-fey-plagued-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-plagued-helmet.name: Arisen Fey Plagued Helmet
arisen-fey-plagued-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-raven-boots.name: Arisen Fey Raven Boots
arisen-fey-raven-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-raven-garb.name: Arisen Fey Raven Garb
arisen-fey-raven-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fey-raven-veil.name: Arisen Fey Raven Veil
arisen-fey-raven-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-fog-blade.name: Arisen Fog Blade
arisen-fog-blade.description: A foggy, mysterious blade. It may put an opponent to sleep.

arisen-gandring.name: Arisen Gandring
arisen-gandring.description: Deals arcane damage and may cause curse.

arisen-garb.name: Arisen Garb
arisen-garb.description: Light armor worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-gazing-staff.name: Arisen Gazing Staff
arisen-gazing-staff.description: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. Increases your ability to see.

arisen-genius.name: Arisen Genius
arisen-genius.description: The easily recognizable pole-arm of Cade, the great Avalonian inventor. Its hidden features can cause a variety of status effects.

arisen-globe-holder.name: Arisen Globe Holder
arisen-globe-holder.description: Take the stance of Atlas, disabling your ability to use Ward, but locking it in place.

arisen-greaves.name: Arisen Greaves
arisen-greaves.description: Leggings worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-helhest.name: Arisen Helhest
arisen-helhest.description: The mighty bow of Hel. Its loosed arrows will light your path while exploring the world.

arisen-helmet.name: Arisen Helmet
arisen-helmet.description: Helmet worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-hels-boots.name: Arisen Hel's Boots
arisen-hels-boots.description: Footwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

arisen-hels-feathers.name: Arisen Hel's Feathers
arisen-hels-feathers.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 3 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

arisen-hels-garb.name: Arisen Hel's Garb
arisen-hels-garb.description: Light armor of Hel, the shadowed rogue. It grants its wearer additional dexterity and status immunities. Additionally, it is well suited for adornment.

arisen-hels-veil.name: Arisen Hel's Veil
arisen-hels-veil.description: Headwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. Wearing it may increase one's chance of landing a critical attack.

arisen-hood.name: Arisen Hood
arisen-hood.description: Hood worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-horror.name: Arisen Horror
arisen-horror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.

arisen-hydra-staff.name: Arisen Hydra Staff
arisen-hydra-staff.description: Archistaff forged of the remains of a great Hydra. It can provide one with various elemental resistances.

arisen-imagination.name: Arisen Imagination
arisen-imagination.description: An extremely odd staff, carried by a cryptid mimic. It can occasionally cause unpredicted status effects.

arisen-ithras-blade.name: Arisen Ithra's Blade
arisen-ithras-blade.description: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

arisen-ithras-staff.name: Arisen Ithra's Staff
arisen-ithras-staff.description: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

arisen-jolly-stockings.name: Arisen Jolly Stockings
arisen-jolly-stockings.description: Socks of a generous and plump man.

arisen-kaladanda.name: Arisen Kaladanda
arisen-kaladanda.description: Staff of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-kerberos-claws.name: Arisen Kerberos Claws
arisen-kerberos-claws.description: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.

arisen-kerberos-hood.name: Arisen Kerberos Hood
arisen-kerberos-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.

arisen-kerberos-staff.name: Arisen Kerberos Staff
arisen-kerberos-staff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

arisen-kerberos-sword.name: Arisen Kerberos Sword
arisen-kerberos-sword.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

arisen-kings-crown.name: Arisen King's Crown
arisen-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

arisen-kings-sceptre.name: Arisen King's Sceptre
arisen-kings-sceptre.description: The old staff of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship.

arisen-labrys.name: Arisen Labrys
arisen-labrys.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

arisen-macha-pillar.name: Arisen Macha Pillar
arisen-macha-pillar.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-masamune.name: Arisen Masamune
arisen-masamune.description: A beautiful blade that resemble stars in the night sky.

arisen-minotaur-axe.name: Arisen Minotaur Axe
arisen-minotaur-axe.description: A large, crushing axe used by a minotaur

arisen-monster-tome.name: Arisen Monster Tome
arisen-monster-tome.description: A tome recounting the cursed stories of Fafnir. Increases experience earned at the expense of your potential.

arisen-nagamaki.name: Arisen Nagamaki
arisen-nagamaki.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

arisen-naggeneens-hat.name: Arisen Naggeneen's Hat
arisen-naggeneens-hat.description: Headwear of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It protects its wearer from both poison and toxicity.

arisen-neman-havoc.name: Arisen Neman Havoc
arisen-neman-havoc.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

arisen-north-star.name: Arisen North Star
arisen-north-star.description: Converts most of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

arisen-olympia-armor.name: Arisen Olympia Armor
arisen-olympia-armor.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympia-headdress.name: Arisen Olympia Headdress
arisen-olympia-headdress.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

arisen-olympia-helmet.name: Arisen Olympia Helmet
arisen-olympia-helmet.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympia-hood.name: Arisen Olympia Hood
arisen-olympia-hood.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympia-leggings.name: Arisen Olympia Leggings
arisen-olympia-leggings.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympia-legwraps.name: Arisen Olympia Legwraps
arisen-olympia-legwraps.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

arisen-olympia-mantle.name: Arisen Olympia Mantle
arisen-olympia-mantle.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

arisen-olympia-robe.name: Arisen Olympia Robe
arisen-olympia-robe.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympia-shoes.name: Arisen Olympia Shoes
arisen-olympia-shoes.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

arisen-olympian-joist.name: Arisen Olympian Joist
arisen-olympian-joist.description: Take the stance of Asteria, increasing your magic power but losing a great amount of defenses. Additionally, mana will burn away each turn.

arisen-ophion-banner.name: Arisen Ophion Banner
arisen-ophion-banner.description: Take the stance of Ophion, potentially dispersing any status effect received to your summoned minions.

arisen-oxen-axe.name: Arisen Oxen Axe
arisen-oxen-axe.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

arisen-palm-branch.name: Arisen Palm Branch
arisen-palm-branch.description: Take the stance of Aegir, greatly increasing defenses at the expense of offensive power.

arisen-plagued-cuirass.name: Arisen Plagued Cuirass
arisen-plagued-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-plagued-greaves.name: Arisen Plagued Greaves
arisen-plagued-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-plagued-helmet.name: Arisen Plagued Helmet
arisen-plagued-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-raven-boots.name: Arisen Raven Boots
arisen-raven-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-raven-garb.name: Arisen Raven Garb
arisen-raven-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-raven-veil.name: Arisen Raven Veil
arisen-raven-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

arisen-realm-katar.name: Arisen Realm Katar
arisen-realm-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

arisen-reinbow.name: Arisen Reinbow
arisen-reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

arisen-rhada-greatshield.name: Arisen Rhada Greatshield
arisen-rhada-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

arisen-rhada-greatsword.name: Arisen Rhada Greatsword
arisen-rhada-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

arisen-rift-summoner-boots.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Boots
arisen-rift-summoner-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When standing strong with these boots, your summons will be slightly stronger.

arisen-rift-summoner-helmet.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Helmet
arisen-rift-summoner-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this helmet, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

arisen-rift-summoner-plate.name: Arisen Rift Summoner Plate
arisen-rift-summoner-plate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this armor, your summons will be more likely to protect you.

arisen-riftguard-armor.name: Arisen Riftguard Armor
arisen-riftguard-armor.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, one will take reduced self damage from status effects.

arisen-riftguard-helmet.name: Arisen Riftguard Helmet
arisen-riftguard-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

arisen-riftguard-leggings.name: Arisen Riftguard Leggings
arisen-riftguard-leggings.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

arisen-riftrogue-boots.name: Arisen Riftrogue Boots
arisen-riftrogue-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

arisen-riftrogue-chestplate.name: Arisen Riftrogue Chestplate
arisen-riftrogue-chestplate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

arisen-riftrogue-helmet.name: Arisen Riftrogue Helmet
arisen-riftrogue-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

arisen-ring.name: Arisen Ring
arisen-ring.description: A ring of the arisen cursed Fafnir. Increases your attack and magic power at the expense of your longevity.

arisen-robe.name: Arisen Robe
arisen-robe.description: Robe worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-sea-axe.name: Arisen Sea Axe
arisen-sea-axe.description: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

arisen-shadeblades.name: Arisen Shadeblades
arisen-shadeblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

arisen-shield.name: Arisen Shield
arisen-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

arisen-shoes.name: Arisen Shoes
arisen-shoes.description: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

arisen-silk-crossbow.name: Arisen Silk Crossbow
arisen-silk-crossbow.description: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.

arisen-sleighblade.name: Arisen Sleighblade
arisen-sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

arisen-staff-of-tiamat.name: Arisen Staff of Tiamat
arisen-staff-of-tiamat.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-staff-of-typhon.name: Arisen Staff of Typhon
arisen-staff-of-typhon.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

arisen-staff-of-wolves.name: Arisen Staff of Wolves
arisen-staff-of-wolves.description: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.

arisen-stone-dagger.name: Arisen Stone Dagger
arisen-stone-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

arisen-surtrs-boots.name: Arisen Surtr's Boots
arisen-surtrs-boots.description: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

arisen-surtrs-cuirass.name: Arisen Surtr's Cuirass
arisen-surtrs-cuirass.description: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.

arisen-surtrs-helmet.name: Arisen Surtr's Helmet
arisen-surtrs-helmet.description: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.

arisen-surtrs-shield.name: Arisen Surtr's Shield
arisen-surtrs-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

arisen-surtrs-sword.name: Arisen Surtr's Sword
arisen-surtrs-sword.description: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.

arisen-teardrop.name: Arisen Teardrop
arisen-teardrop.description: A relic of Mammon capable of granting a piece of equipment additional power while occasionally lowering an opponent's attack or magical power.

arisen-terror.name: Arisen Terror
arisen-terror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more gold and orns.

arisen-thors-arc.name: Arisen Thor's Arc
arisen-thors-arc.description: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.

arisen-thors-hammer.name: Arisen Thor's Hammer
arisen-thors-hammer.description: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.

arisen-tizona.name: Arisen Tizona
arisen-tizona.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

arisen-top-hat.name: Arisen Top Hat
arisen-top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

arisen-treecutter.name: Arisen Treecutter
arisen-treecutter.description: Take the stance of Gymir, increasing your attack power, but taking damage every turn.

arisen-trevelyans-archistaff.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Archistaff
arisen-trevelyans-archistaff.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

arisen-trevelyans-charm.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Charm
arisen-trevelyans-charm.description: Amulet carried by Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will increase your offensive power when carrying a weapon with both hands.

arisen-trevelyans-hood.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Hood
arisen-trevelyans-hood.description: Hood of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

arisen-trevelyans-robe.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Robe
arisen-trevelyans-robe.description: Robe of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

arisen-trevelyans-shoes.name: Arisen Trevelyan's Shoes
arisen-trevelyans-shoes.description: Shoes of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing them will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

arisen-vandals-veil.name: Arisen Vandal's Veil
arisen-vandals-veil.description: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.

arisen-vulcans-archistaff.name: Arisen Vulcan's Archistaff
arisen-vulcans-archistaff.description: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.

arisen-vulcans-longsword.name: Arisen Vulcan's Longsword
arisen-vulcans-longsword.description: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.

arisen-willow-branch.name: Arisen Willow Branch
arisen-willow-branch.description: Take the stance of Eistla, greatly increasing hybrid offensive ability at the expense of your follower or summons' prowess.

arisen-witchs-hat.name: Arisen Witch's Hat
arisen-witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.

arisen-witchs-staff.name: Arisen Witch's Staff
arisen-witchs-staff.description: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

arisen-wolfbane.name: Arisen Wolfbane
arisen-wolfbane.description: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.

arisen-wolven-tower-shield.name: Arisen Wolven Tower Shield
arisen-wolven-tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

arms-of-eos.name: Arms of Eos
arms-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will make pacts with your summons more effective.

arms-of-oceanus.name: Arms of Oceanus
arms-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

arms-of-prometheus.name: Arms of Prometheus
arms-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

arms-of-selene.name: Arms of Selene
arms-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will make hybrid spells and skills more effective.

arms-of-themis.name: Arms of Themis
arms-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

artifice-gada.name: Artifice Gada
artifice-gada.description: The crippling weapon of Knight Artifice, the dragonslayer of Avalon. It can lower an opponent's magical potential.

artios-hide.name: Artio's Hide
artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

ascalon.name: Ascalon
ascalon.description: An adorned sword forged of the most blessed of materials. It's great light can illuminate your path while blinding your opponents.

asgard-shield.name: Asgard Shield
asgard-shield.description: Shield carried by valkyries of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

asgards-summit.name: Asgard's Summit
asgards-summit.description: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.

ash-plumed-boots.name: Ash-Plumed Boots
ash-plumed-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-cowl.name: Ash-Plumed Cowl
ash-plumed-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-cuirass.name: Ash-Plumed Cuirass
ash-plumed-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-garb.name: Ash-Plumed Garb
ash-plumed-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-greaves.name: Ash-Plumed Greaves
ash-plumed-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-helmet.name: Ash-Plumed Helmet
ash-plumed-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-hood.name: Ash-Plumed Hood
ash-plumed-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-robe.name: Ash-Plumed Robe
ash-plumed-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ash-plumed-shoes.name: Ash-Plumed Shoes
ash-plumed-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ashen-boots.name: Ashen Boots
ashen-boots.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

ashen-hat.name: Ashen Hat
ashen-hat.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

ashen-phoenician-boots.name: Ashen Phoenician Boots
ashen-phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-cowl.name: Ashen Phoenician Cowl
ashen-phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-cuirass.name: Ashen Phoenician Cuirass
ashen-phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-garb.name: Ashen Phoenician Garb
ashen-phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-greaves.name: Ashen Phoenician Greaves
ashen-phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-helmet.name: Ashen Phoenician Helmet
ashen-phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-hood.name: Ashen Phoenician Hood
ashen-phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-robe.name: Ashen Phoenician Robe
ashen-phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-phoenician-shield.name: Ashen Phoenician Shield
ashen-phoenician-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

ashen-phoenician-shoes.name: Ashen Phoenician Shoes
ashen-phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of a fallen Phoenix. Wearing this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

ashen-pinion.name: Ashen Pinion
ashen-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a fallen Phoenix.

ashen-robe.name: Ashen Robe
ashen-robe.description: Pale attire of elite Balor mages.

ashen-ruby.name: Ashen Ruby
ashen-ruby.description: A jewel with a crimson glow. Adorning this upon a weapon will slightly heal your wounds when damaging an opponent.

ashen-staff.name: Ashen Staff
ashen-staff.description: A pale staff granted to skilled Balor mages.

askr-armor.name: Askr Armor
askr-armor.description: Heavy armor of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

askr-boots.name: Askr Boots
askr-boots.description: Boots of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

askr-cowl.name: Askr Cowl
askr-cowl.description: Cowl of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

askr-garb.name: Askr Garb
askr-garb.description: Garb of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

askr-helmet.name: Askr Helmet
askr-helmet.description: Helmet of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

askr-leggings.name: Askr Leggings
askr-leggings.description: Heavy leggings of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

assassins-jewel.name: Assassin's Jewel
assassins-jewel.description: An adornment of assassins. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's defenses.

atepomarus-mail.name: Atepomarus Mail
atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

atgeir.name: Atgeir
atgeir.description: A deadly polearm carried by the fallen Heimdall, a lord of the Nothren.

atlas.name: Atlas
atlas.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

attack-tonic.name: Attack Tonic
attack-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.

attuning-hood.name: Attuning Hood
attuning-hood.description: Hood worn by novice summoners. It slightly increases the power of summoned beasts.

attuning-robe.name: Attuning Robe
attuning-robe.description: Robe worn by novice summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

autumna-crested-shield.name: Autumna Crested Shield
autumna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

avalon-crown.name: Avalon Crown
avalon-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Arthus. Although it offers little in terms of defense, it can protect its wearer from being cursed or petrified.

avalon-knight-armor.name: Avalon Knight Armor
avalon-knight-armor.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

avalon-knight-helmet.name: Avalon Knight Helmet
avalon-knight-helmet.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

avalon-knight-leggings.name: Avalon Knight Leggings
avalon-knight-leggings.description: Heavy armor of prestigious Avalon knights.

avalon-melody.name: Avalon Melody
avalon-melody.description: Famed golden flute of an Avalon bard. Playing its songs can temporarily raise one's magical defense.

avalon-ore.name: Avalon Ore
avalon-ore.description: A mighty alloy. It was used to craft Avalonian weapons and armor.

axe-of-night.name: Axe of Night
axe-of-night.description: An axe wielded by monsters of the night. Enhanced with dark magic.

axe-of-the-chimera.name: Axe of the Chimera
axe-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

axe-of-tiamat.name: Axe of Tiamat
axe-of-tiamat.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

axe-of-typhon.name: Axe of Typhon
axe-of-typhon.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

axe.name: Axe
axe.description: A woodcutter's axe. Useful as a tool or as a weapon.

azure-crystal.name: Azure Crystal
azure-crystal.description: An azure crystal of the night. Increases magical ability at the expense of physical prowess.

azure-dioscuri-ring.name: Azure Dioscuri Ring
azure-dioscuri-ring.description: The ring of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.

azure-pinion.name: Azure Pinion
azure-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional magic power at the expense of magical resistance and mana.

azure-twinbow.name: Azure Twinbow
azure-twinbow.description: The Twinbow of a fused Dioscuri. It grants additional offensive power to those that prefer a more hybrid approach to combat.

badb-boots.name: Badb Boots
badb-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

badb-catha.name: Badb Catha
badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

badb-garb.name: Badb Garb
badb-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

badb-veil.name: Badb Veil
badb-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

badb-warbow.name: Badb Warbow
badb-warbow.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

badbs-feathers.name: Badb's Feathers
badbs-feathers.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

bag-of-treats.name: Bag of Treats
bag-of-treats.description: A bag of treats of lore and luck. Carrying it increases gold, orns, and experience earned. You may also find more items.

bag-of-tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
bag-of-tricks.description: A bag of tricks of lore and luck. Carrying it may add the chance for many status effects to your attacks and spells.

balanced-epee.name: Balanced Epee
balanced-epee.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.

baldr-battlerobe.name: Baldr Battlerobe
baldr-battlerobe.description: War-mage's robe of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

baldr-boots.name: Baldr Boots
baldr-boots.description: War-mage's boots of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

baldr-hood.name: Baldr Hood
baldr-hood.description: War-mage's hood of Baldr, the undying. Wearing this item will increase HP while making one slightly more resistant to status effects.

baldur.name: Baldur
baldur.description: A chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren.

balins-left.name: Balin's Left
balins-left.description: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's left hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's magic power when attacking.

balins-right.name: Balin's Right
balins-right.description: A heavy great sword carried in Sir Balin's right hand. A blow from this blade can lower an opponent's attack power.

balor-archistaff.name: Balor Archistaff
balor-archistaff.description: Staff wielded by Balor mages. It increases mana at the expense of health.

balor-armor.name: Balor Armor
balor-armor.description: Heavy armor typically worn by Balor warriors.

balor-crown.name: Balor Crown
balor-crown.description: The fabled crown of King Balor.

balor-dagger.name: Balor Dagger
balor-dagger.description: Dagger often carried as a sidearm by demon soldiers. Has the chance of both burning and causing an opponent to bleed.

balor-helmet.name: Balor Helmet
balor-helmet.description: A heavy helmet typically worn by Balor warriors.

balor-katana.name: Balor Katana
balor-katana.description: Katana wielded by Balor rogues. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

balor-leggings.name: Balor Leggings
balor-leggings.description: Heavy leggings typically worn by Balor warriors.

balor-muskellunge.name: Balor Muskellunge
balor-muskellunge.description: Quite a rare fish, seemingly ascended from the Underworld.

balor-robe.name: Balor Robe
balor-robe.description: A dark, dusty robe typically worn by Balor mages.

balor-shield.name: Balor Shield
balor-shield.description: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.

balor-sword.name: Balor Sword
balor-sword.description: A commonly used sword of knights of Balor.

balorite.name: Balorite
balorite.description: A golden material useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

band-of-false-gods.name: Band of False Gods
band-of-false-gods.description: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.

band-of-gods.name: Band of Gods
band-of-gods.description: A ring worn by the elemental Gods of old. Increases gold, orns, and experience earned.

bandits-axe.name: Bandit's Axe
bandits-axe.description: A large axe carried by the mightiest bandits.

bandits-cloak.name: Bandit's Cloak
bandits-cloak.description: Heavy cloak of a bandit. Offers mild defense against the elements.

bandits-dagger.name: Bandit's Dagger
bandits-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. It slightly increases dexterity.

bandits-hood.name: Bandit's Hood
bandits-hood.description: Heavy hood made of strong hide. Offers mild protection against the elements.

baneblade.name: Baneblade
baneblade.description: Ceremonial blade of a long forgotten civilization. It has a small chance of cursing an opponent.

banshee-boots.name: Banshee Boots
banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

banshee-robe.name: Banshee Robe
banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

banshee-veil.name: Banshee Veil
banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

basilisk-talons.name: Basilisk Talons
basilisk-talons.description: A pair of dark kunai, forged of a basilisk's claws.

basilisk-tooth.name: Basilisk Tooth
basilisk-tooth.description: Thin sword forged of Basilisk remains. It has a chance to cause either poison or blight.

battlemage-armor.name: Battlemage Armor
battlemage-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

battlemage-boots.name: Battlemage Boots
battlemage-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

battlemage-helmet.name: Battlemage Helmet
battlemage-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

batwing-bow.name: Batwing Bow
batwing-bow.description: Bow forged of a great bat's remains. It may break an opponent's defenses.

beags-lute.name: Beag's Lute
beags-lute.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.

bearclaw.name: Bearclaw
bearclaw.description: A crude blade forged of the remains of a bear.

bearskin.name: Bearskin
bearskin.description: Armor made of the hide of a bear.

beasts-blood.name: Beast's Blood
beasts-blood.description: A simple concoction. Consuming it may attract extra monsters to you.

beatrices-staff.name: Beatrice's Staff
beatrices-staff.description: The staff of the aspiring sorceress, Beatrice. It slightly boosts its wielder's mana.

bedsheet.name: Bedsheet
bedsheet.description: A simple white sheet that one could use to mock a spirit. It protects one from falling asleep in battle.

beguiled-armor.name: Beguiled Armor
beguiled-armor.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-boots.name: Beguiled Boots
beguiled-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-cowl.name: Beguiled Cowl
beguiled-cowl.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-garb.name: Beguiled Garb
beguiled-garb.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-heavy-boots.name: Beguiled Heavy Boots
beguiled-heavy-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-helmet.name: Beguiled Helmet
beguiled-helmet.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-hood.name: Beguiled Hood
beguiled-hood.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-mystic-katar.name: Beguiled Mystic Katar
beguiled-mystic-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

beguiled-robe.name: Beguiled Robe
beguiled-robe.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

beguiled-shoes.name: Beguiled Shoes
beguiled-shoes.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.
