belenuss-boots.name: Belenus's Boots
belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

belt-of-cerus.name: Belt of Cerus
belt-of-cerus.description: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.

belt.name: Belt
belt.description: A standard belt. Improves your dexterity.

beowulfs-charm.name: Beowulf's Charm
beowulfs-charm.description: Amulet often carried by the Beowulf. Wearing this item greatly increases the power of your follower,  may cause them to act less often.

berserk-mushroom.name: Berserk Mushroom
berserk-mushroom.description: A mushroom of unknown origin. Eating it will cause one to enrage.

bestial-eye.name: Bestial Eye
bestial-eye.description: Red eye of the Behemoth. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.

bestial-potion.name: Bestial Potion
bestial-potion.description: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.

beta-myrddin-cloak.name: Beta Myrddin Cloak
beta-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

beta-myrddin-cowl.name: Beta Myrddin Cowl
beta-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

beta-myrddin-hood.name: Beta Myrddin Hood
beta-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

beta-myrddin-robe.name: Beta Myrddin Robe
beta-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

beta-myrddin-shield.name: Beta Myrddin Shield
beta-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

beta-myrddin.name: Beta Myrddin
beta-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

bident.name: Bident
bident.description: A mighty pole-arm carried by Hades, the exiled guardian of the underworld.

bird-whistle.name: Bird Whistle
bird-whistle.description: A simple whistle useful for calling birds from trees.

black-dragon-armor.name: Black Dragon Armor
black-dragon-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

black-dragon-greaves.name: Black Dragon Greaves
black-dragon-greaves.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

black-dragon-helmet.name: Black Dragon Helmet
black-dragon-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of the great dragon, Fafnir.

black-witch-staff.name: Black Witch Staff
black-witch-staff.description: Old, decrepit, dark staff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

blackened-eye-of-kerberos.name: Blackened Eye of Kerberos
blackened-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.

blessed-rune-armor.name: Blessed Rune Armor
blessed-rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

blessed-rune-helmet.name: Blessed Rune Helmet
blessed-rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

blessed-rune-leggings.name: Blessed Rune Leggings
blessed-rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

blight-arrows.name: Blight Arrows
blight-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

blight-pendant.name: Blight Pendant
blight-pendant.description: A pendant often worn by dragoons. It protects its wearer from blight.

blinders.name: Blinders
blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a wild horse's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

blood-sword.name: Blood Sword
blood-sword.description: A fiery red blade used by the Fomorians.

blue-crystal.name: Blue Crystal
blue-crystal.description: An odd blue crystal. Boosts MP when equipped.

blue-dagger.name: Blue Dagger
blue-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with ice.

blue-eye-of-kerberos.name: Blue Eye of Kerberos
blue-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to freeze.

blue-feather.name: Blue Feather
blue-feather.description: The feather of a Zu. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

blue-gem.name: Blue Gem
blue-gem.description: An odd blue gem. Raises MP when equipped.

blue-wand.name: Blue Wand
blue-wand.description: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with ice.

bolt.name: Bolt
bolt.description: A spear of a Stormforce warrior. Very few can wield this weapon without feeling a great shock.

bone-shield.name: Bone Shield
bone-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

bone.name: Bone
bone.description: A fragment of sturdy bone. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

bonecrusher.name: Bonecrusher
bonecrusher.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

bonesong.name: Bonesong
bonesong.description: An instrument of a long fallen Odok warrior. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily boost one's critical hit rate.

book-of-darkness.name: Book of Darkness
book-of-darkness.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-earth.name: Book of Earth
book-of-earth.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-fire.name: Book of Fire
book-of-fire.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-light.name: Book of Light
book-of-light.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-lightning.name: Book of Lightning
book-of-lightning.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-the-arcane.name: Book of the Arcane
book-of-the-arcane.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-the-dragon.name: Book of the Dragon
book-of-the-dragon.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

book-of-water.name: Book of Water
book-of-water.description: A book carried by a Student of Apollyon. Before being beguiled with destructive magics, Apollyon studied the elven ways of elemental balance. These books contain great elemental affinity.

boots-of-earth.name: Boots of Earth
boots-of-earth.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.

boots-of-fire.name: Boots of Fire
boots-of-fire.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the heat. Grants protection from fire.

boots-of-storm.name: Boots of Storm
boots-of-storm.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.

boots-of-the-sea.name: Boots of the Sea
boots-of-the-sea.description: Boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.

boreals-staff.name: Boreal's Staff
boreals-staff.description: Chilling staff of Boreal, a Frozenguard elite. It has a high chance of freezing an opponent.

bormanas-mantle.name: Bormana's Mantle
bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

boulderbold.name: Boulderbold
boulderbold.description: Earthen polearm of Boulder, the Earthen Legion elite. It has a high chance of stunning an opponent.

bow-of-diana.name: Bow of Diana
bow-of-diana.description: Silver bow of a legendary huntress. It grants its wielder extra dexterity.

bow-of-scales.name: Bow of Scales
bow-of-scales.description: Although the Lizarr seemed untrained in advanced weaponry, these fine bows have been found within their settlements. This bow is enchanted with the power of ice and water.

bow-of-the-chimera.name: Bow of the Chimera
bow-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful bow forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

bow-of-tiamat.name: Bow of Tiamat
bow-of-tiamat.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

bow-of-typhon.name: Bow of Typhon
bow-of-typhon.description: A superb bow forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

bricrius-bow.name: Bricriu's Bow
bricrius-bow.description: Bombard all opponents with many arrows.

brilliant-feathers.name: Brilliant Feathers
brilliant-feathers.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

briny-pendant.name: Briny Pendant
briny-pendant.description: A pendant found within wreckage, deep within the sea. It protects its wearer from blight, poison, rot, and toxic.

broadsword.name: Broadsword
broadsword.description: A sword with a wide blade.

broken-statue.name: Broken Statue
broken-statue.description: A broken piece of a statue. It may be useful in upgrading rarer weapons.

bulls-eye.name: Bull's Eye
bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

bulwark.name: Bulwark
bulwark.description: Armor forged of the remains of the dragon Nidhogg. Contrary to its size, it is of little weight and can be worn by anyone. It grants one great resistance from Dragon magic, while boosting the strength of one's own.

caladbolg.name: Caladbolg
caladbolg.description: A blade with the power to cleave the tops from the hills. It may paralyze an opponent, while protecting its wielder from paralyzation.

calloused-hands-of-oceanus.name: Calloused Hands of Oceanus
calloused-hands-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

candle-pike.name: Candle-pike
candle-pike.description: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

candle-staff.name: Candle-staff
candle-staff.description: This staff of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

candy-cane.name: Candy Cane
candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

canon-waystone.name: Canon Waystone
canon-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to story quest monster locations.

carls-dagger.name: Carl's Dagger
carls-dagger.description: A simple yet sentimental dagger of the aloof one, Carl.

carls-ring-646f22f4.name: Carl's Ring
carls-ring-646f22f4.description: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.

carls-ring.name: Carl's Ring
carls-ring.description: Iron ring of the aloof one, Carl. Slightly raises some stats.

carnwennan.name: Carnwennan
carnwennan.description: A mythical dagger said to have the magical power to shroud its user in shadow. It may lull an opponent to sleep.

caroling-lute.name: Caroling Lute
caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

castors-archistaff.name: Castor's Archistaff
castors-archistaff.description: Azure staff of Castor, the Dioscuri magician. Castor and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

caticatona-cuirass.name: Caticatona Cuirass
caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

caturixs-robe.name: Caturix's Robe
caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

cavestone.name: Cavestone
cavestone.description: Stone mined from an eerie cave. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

celestial-archistaff.name: Celestial Archistaff
celestial-archistaff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-axe.name: Celestial Axe
celestial-axe.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-bow.name: Celestial Bow
celestial-bow.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-greatbow.name: Celestial Greatbow
celestial-greatbow.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-hammer.name: Celestial Hammer
celestial-hammer.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-lute.name: Celestial Lute
celestial-lute.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-moondrop.name: Celestial Moondrop
celestial-moondrop.description: A celestial essence fallen from the skies above. Consuming it will recollect stories of the Giants and Titans, summoning a Titan to your area.

celestial-quarterstaff.name: Celestial Quarterstaff
celestial-quarterstaff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-scythe.name: Celestial Scythe
celestial-scythe.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-staff.name: Celestial Staff
celestial-staff.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

celestial-stardrop.name: Celestial Stardrop
celestial-stardrop.description: A celestial essence fallen from the skies above. Consuming it will recollect stories of the Giants and Titans, summoning a Giant to your area.

celestial-thinblade.name: Celestial Thinblade
celestial-thinblade.description: An extremely malleable yet durable weapon, constructed of refined Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

chained-shadeblades.name: Chained Shadeblades
chained-shadeblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

chained-shadowblades.name: Chained Shadowblades
chained-shadowblades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

charons-grimoire.name: Charon's Grimoire
charons-grimoire.description: Summon one to many beasts to assist you. Requires 3 turns in battle.

charons-shade-staff.name: Charon's Shade Staff
charons-shade-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

charons-shadow-staff.name: Charon's Shadow Staff
charons-shadow-staff.description: Staff of Charon, the Grand Summoner. It will boost the power of your summoned allies.

chimera-armor.name: Chimera Armor
chimera-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of Chimera remains.

chimera-greaves.name: Chimera Greaves
chimera-greaves.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of Chimeric remains.

chimera-helmet.name: Chimera Helmet
chimera-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of Chimera remains.

chimera-stacatto.name: Chimera Stacatto
chimera-stacatto.description: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of beasts.

claymore.name: Claymore
claymore.description: A large cross-hilted weapon that is seen as a sign of distinction. It may break an opponent's defenses.

cliffside-cuirass.name: Cliffside Cuirass
cliffside-cuirass.description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

clotas-garb.name: Clota's Garb
clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

clurichaun-arrows.name: Clurichaun Arrows
clurichaun-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

clurichaun-soul-blade.name: Clurichaun Soul Blade
clurichaun-soul-blade.description: Fabled ceremonial blade of a forgotten clurichaun. It has a good chance of poisoning an opponent.

cockatrice-mail.name: Cockatrice Mail
cockatrice-mail.description: Chestplate forged of the remains of a mighty Cockatrice. It grants its wearer immunity from petrification.

coiled-shield.name: Coiled Shield
coiled-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

coin-purse.name: Coin Purse
coin-purse.description: A bag for coins. Slightly raises gold earned.

colada.name: Colada
colada.description: A greatsword often used in offensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical prowess.

colossal-armor.name: Colossal Armor
colossal-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

colossal-helmet.name: Colossal Helmet
colossal-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

colossal-leggings.name: Colossal Leggings
colossal-leggings.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of a colossal being. Boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

conalls-wand.name: Conall's Wand
conalls-wand.description: Deals non-elemental magic damage and may suspend an enemy in time.

contraption.name: Contraption
contraption.description: A small, strange thing made by Cade, the great inventor. It can provide all sorts of benefits to a piece of armor when adorned upon it.

coral-armor.name: Coral Armor
coral-armor.description: Armor of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-boots.name: Coral Boots
coral-boots.description: Boots of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-cowl.name: Coral Cowl
coral-cowl.description: Headwear of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-garb.name: Coral Garb
coral-garb.description: Armor of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-helmet.name: Coral Helmet
coral-helmet.description: Headwear of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-hood.name: Coral Hood
coral-hood.description: Hood of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral-robe.name: Coral Robe
coral-robe.description: Robe of coral, fetched from the high seas. It boasts great resistance at the sacrifice of physical defenses.

coral.name: Coral
coral.description: Currency of the Nothren people, typically used in port towns.

cormacs-shotel.name: Cormac's Shotel
cormacs-shotel.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

counts-garment.name: Count's Garment
counts-garment.description: Cloak of a count. It's quite stylish, really.

counts-hood.name: Count's Hood
counts-hood.description: Hood of a count. It's quite stylish, really.

court-jesters-outfit.name: Court Jester's Outfit
court-jesters-outfit.description: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold and orns earned.

court-staff.name: Court Staff
court-staff.description: An archistaff of Avalon that is capable of lowering an opponent's resistance.

cowards-blade.name: Coward's Blade
cowards-blade.description: A hooked blade used by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

cowards-boots.name: Coward's Boots
cowards-boots.description: Boots worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

cowards-cloak.name: Coward's Cloak
cowards-cloak.description: Cloak worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

cowards-cowl.name: Coward's Cowl
cowards-cowl.description: Headpiece worn by Avalon assassins. Some say the great King Arthus had a secretive hobby.

cracked-mirror.name: Cracked Mirror
cracked-mirror.description: A mirrored shield. At the sacrifice of Ward, one should have been able to reflect on themselves and gain mana. But alas, it is cracked.

crest-of-autumna.name: Crest of Autumna
crest-of-autumna.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Autumna. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

crest-of-avalon.name: Crest of Avalon
crest-of-avalon.description: An easily recognizable shield depicting the crest of Avalon.

crest-of-nocturna.name: Crest of Nocturna
crest-of-nocturna.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

crest-of-sumner.name: Crest of Sumner
crest-of-sumner.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Sumner. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

crest-of-wintara.name: Crest of Wintara
crest-of-wintara.description: Proof of trials complete for the Fomorian house of Wintara. Use this item to summon a mighty projection.

crimson-eye.name: Crimson Eye
crimson-eye.description: A strange crimson eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

crimson-pinion.name: Crimson Pinion
crimson-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional attack power at the expense of physical defense and mana.

crooked-shotel.name: Crooked Shotel
crooked-shotel.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.

crows-feathers.name: Crow's Feathers
crows-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a crow. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

crowsong.name: Crowsong
crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

crucifix.name: Crucifix
crucifix.description: A staff of the occult. Boasts strong magic power, but can also be used as a weapon. Additionally It heals its wielder when dealing damage.

crusading-armor.name: Crusading Armor
crusading-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

crusading-boots.name: Crusading Boots
crusading-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

crusading-helmet.name: Crusading Helmet
crusading-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

crystal-eye.name: Crystal Eye
crystal-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with even stranger magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats.

crystal-halberd.name: Crystal Halberd
crystal-halberd.description: A crystalline polearm carried by the most enlightened of travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

crystal-staff.name: Crystal Staff
crystal-staff.description: A magical crystalline staff carried by the most enlightened travelers. It is well suited for adornment.

crystalis.name: Crystalis
crystalis.description: A ceremonial sword of enlightened royalty. It can protect one from having their stats lowered and is well suited for adornment.

cure-all.name: Cure-all
cure-all.description: A bitter green elixir that heals poison, bleeding, blight, frozen, burning, paralysis, sleep, blindness, or rot.

cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.name: Cursed Aengus Og's Lute
cursed-aengus-ogs-lute.description: Second lute of Aengus Og, famous Bard of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Aengus Og sang tales of Fomoria's conquests, but was quick to flee the lands when the great curse took haste. Does he still sing of conquest, we wonder? While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

cursed-artios-hide.name: Cursed Artio's Hide
cursed-artios-hide.description: Bear hide armor of Artio, bear Goddess of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Artio, of three siblings, spent her days taming wild bears. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

cursed-atepomarus-mail.name: Cursed Atepomarus Mail
cursed-atepomarus-mail.description: Heavy armor of Atepomarus, horse God and leader of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Atepomarus, father to the three siblings, was set to ride three horses at once into battle. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

cursed-autumna-crested-shield.name: Cursed Autumna Crested Shield
cursed-autumna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

cursed-belenuss-boots.name: Cursed Belenus's Boots
cursed-belenuss-boots.description: Boots worn by Belenus, healing God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Belenus, of three siblings, spent his days attending the sick animals of Fomoria's fields. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

cursed-boots.name: Cursed Boots
cursed-boots.description: A seemingly ageless yet pristine pair of boots.

cursed-bormanas-mantle.name: Cursed Bormana's Mantle
cursed-bormanas-mantle.description: Light armor of Bormana, warrior water Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Bormana tended the Sumner crops with castle-sized barrels of water, a true testiment to her strength. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

cursed-caticatona-cuirass.name: Cursed Caticatona Cuirass
cursed-caticatona-cuirass.description: Large heavy armor of Caticatona, leader of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Caticatona, the armored Water Goddess, stood tall against Morrigan's acolytes, but ultimately fell by their staff and sword. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

cursed-caturixs-robe.name: Cursed Caturix's Robe
cursed-caturixs-robe.description: Heavy, armored, robe of Caturix, war God and leader of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Caturix fought Morrigan to the bitter end, ultimately succumbing to the curse in battle. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

cursed-clotas-garb.name: Cursed Clota's Garb
cursed-clotas-garb.description: Light garb of Clota, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Clota and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

cursed-damonas-shield.name: Cursed Damona's Shield

While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

cursed-gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

cursed-imonas-slippers.name: Cursed Imona's Slippers

While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

cursed-leros-hood.name: Cursed Lero's Hood
cursed-leros-hood.description: Hood of Lero, apprentice God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Lero, untrained, youthful, and rather brash, was quick to fall during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

cursed-monster-tome.description: A tome recounting the cursed stories of Fafnir. Increases experience earned at the expense of your potential.

cursed-mullos-blinders.name: Cursed Mullo's Blinders
cursed-mullos-blinders.description: Blinders often used by Mullo, horse God of the Fomorian house of Nocturna. Mullo, of three siblings, spent his days taming wild horses. While wearing this item, you will tame your opponent's followers and summons, causing them to deal less damage to you.

cursed-niskus-boots.name: Cursed Niskus' Boots
cursed-niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traiter to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

dioscuri-mead.description: For some reason, the Dioscuri love this terrible drink for its taste and not benefit. Consuming it will temporarily increase your critical hit rate.

drake-boots.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

drake-helmet.name: Drake Helmet
drake-helmet.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

drake-leggings.name: Drake Leggings
drake-leggings.description: Heavy armor smithed of dragon scale

draugr-staff.name: Draugr Staff
draugr-staff.description: The staff of a draugr. It grants additional mana.

dried-oak.name: Dried Oak
dried-oak.description: A piece of oak, dried over the ages.

dudleys-hammer.name: Dudley's Hammer
dudleys-hammer.description: A massive dwarven hammer, carried by Dudley the steadfast.

dukes-shield.name: Duke's Shield
dukes-shield.description: A shield portraying the emblem of a great duke.

dune-blade.name: Dune Blade
dune-blade.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

durandal.name: Durandal
durandal.description: A sword brought by an angel of God. Some say it is the sharpest sword in existence, easily causing an opponent to bleed.

dusk-armor.name: Dusk Armor
dusk-armor.description: Armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-boots.name: Dusk Boots
dusk-boots.description: Boots of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. They grant one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-cowl.name: Dusk Cowl
dusk-cowl.description: Cowl of a royal Dokkalfar assassin. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-garb.name: Dusk Garb
dusk-garb.description: Light armor of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-helmet.name: Dusk Helmet
dusk-helmet.description: Helmet of a royal Dokkalfar warrior. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-hood.name: Dusk Hood
dusk-hood.description: Hood of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dusk-robe.name: Dusk Robe
dusk-robe.description: Robe of a royal Dokkalfar mage. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

duskbreaker-ef96cc6a.name: Duskbreaker
duskbreaker-ef96cc6a.description: A powerful magical greatbow of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

duskbreaker.name: Duskbreaker
duskbreaker.description: A powerful magical sword of Dokkalfar royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

dynasty.name: Dynasty
dynasty.description: An ancient, strange weapon of ages. It is carried by Anubis, the Jackal, and can cause an opponent to bleed simply by casting a spell.

dyrnwyn.name: Dyrnwyn
dyrnwyn.description: A legendary blade that blazes with fire when drawn.

earthen-arrows.name: Earthen Arrows
earthen-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

earthen-belt.name: Earthen Belt
earthen-belt.description: Belt of Earthen Legion. Grants protection from earthen magic.

earthen-pike.name: Earthen Pike
earthen-pike.description: A pike of a Earth Legionnaire.

earthen-sceptre.name: Earthen Sceptre
earthen-sceptre.description: A staff that harnesses the earthen power below the wielder.

earthstone.name: Earthstone
earthstone.description: A rare piece of earthstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

ebon-candy-cane.name: Ebon Candy Cane
ebon-candy-cane.description: A vibrant cane carried by followers of Scruug. Some say it is even pleasing to the taste. Carrying it will allow you to recover missing HP per turn.

ebon-caroling-lute.name: Ebon Caroling Lute
ebon-caroling-lute.description: A song is best sung with cheer.

ebon-jolly-stockings.name: Ebon Jolly Stockings
ebon-jolly-stockings.description: Socks of a generous and plump man.

ebon-north-star.name: Ebon North Star
ebon-north-star.description: Converts most of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

ebon-reinbow.name: Ebon Reinbow
ebon-reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

ebon-sleighblade.name: Ebon Sleighblade
ebon-sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

ebon-top-hat.name: Ebon Top Hat
ebon-top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

ectoplasm.name: Ectoplasm
ectoplasm.description: Remains of a very spooky ghost. Carrying it will attract additional monsters to you while providing protection from attacks of the physical element, but will often put its wearer to sleep.

egg-nog.name: Egg Nog
egg-nog.description: A strange concoction of a lost civilization. Drinking it in battle can add a little spring to your step.

elite-balor-archistaff.name: Elite Balor Archistaff
elite-balor-archistaff.description: Staff wielded by Balor mages. It increases mana at the expense of health.

elite-balor-armor.name: Elite Balor Armor
elite-balor-armor.description: Heavy armor typically worn by Balor warriors.

elite-balor-helmet.name: Elite Balor Helmet
elite-balor-helmet.description: A heavy helmet typically worn by Balor warriors.

elite-balor-katana.name: Elite Balor Katana
elite-balor-katana.description: Katana wielded by Balor rogues. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

elite-balor-leggings.name: Elite Balor Leggings
elite-balor-leggings.description: Heavy leggings typically worn by Balor warriors.

elite-balor-robe.name: Elite Balor Robe
elite-balor-robe.description: A dark, dusty robe typically worn by Balor mages.

elite-balor-shield.name: Elite Balor Shield
elite-balor-shield.description: A decorated shield often carried by Balor warriors.

elite-balor-sword.name: Elite Balor Sword
elite-balor-sword.description: A commonly used sword of knights of Balor.

elite-draconian-cowl.name: Elite Draconian Cowl
elite-draconian-cowl.description: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.

elite-draconian-garb.name: Elite Draconian Garb
elite-draconian-garb.description: Body coverings of a Draconian rogue.

elite-draconian-hood.name: Elite Draconian Hood
elite-draconian-hood.description: A hood of a Draconian mage.

elite-draconian-robe.name: Elite Draconian Robe
elite-draconian-robe.description: A robe of a Draconian mage.

elite-draconian-staff.name: Elite Draconian Staff
elite-draconian-staff.description: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.

elite-draconian-sword.name: Elite Draconian Sword
elite-draconian-sword.description: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.

elite-dune-blade.name: Elite Dune Blade
elite-dune-blade.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

elite-fomorian-armor.name: Elite Fomorian Armor
elite-fomorian-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

elite-fomorian-cowl.name: Elite Fomorian Cowl
elite-fomorian-cowl.description: A hood worn by Fomorian rogues.

elite-fomorian-garb.name: Elite Fomorian Garb
elite-fomorian-garb.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian rogues.

elite-fomorian-hood.name: Elite Fomorian Hood
elite-fomorian-hood.description: A hood worn by Fomorian mages.

elite-fomorian-leggings.name: Elite Fomorian Leggings
elite-fomorian-leggings.description: Leg armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

elite-fomorian-robe.name: Elite Fomorian Robe
elite-fomorian-robe.description: A robe worn by Fomorian mages.

elite-fomorian-staff.name: Elite Fomorian Staff
elite-fomorian-staff.description: A staff of a Fomorian mage.

elite-fomorian-sword.name: Elite Fomorian Sword
elite-fomorian-sword.description: A sword of a Fomorian warrior.

elite-nothren-shield.name: Elite Nothren Shield
elite-nothren-shield.description: Shield carried by berserkers of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

elstone.name: Elstone
elstone.description: An odd stone often used to craft Elven weapons.

elven-katana.name: Elven Katana
elven-katana.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.

elven-staff.name: Elven Staff
elven-staff.description: A highly decorative staff wielded by Elven mages.

elven-sword.name: Elven Sword
elven-sword.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors.

ember-plumed-boots.name: Ember-Plumed Boots
ember-plumed-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-cowl.name: Ember-Plumed Cowl
ember-plumed-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-cuirass.name: Ember-Plumed Cuirass
ember-plumed-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-garb.name: Ember-Plumed Garb
ember-plumed-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-greaves.name: Ember-Plumed Greaves
ember-plumed-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-helmet.name: Ember-Plumed Helmet
ember-plumed-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-hood.name: Ember-Plumed Hood
ember-plumed-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-robe.name: Ember-Plumed Robe
ember-plumed-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

ember-plumed-shoes.name: Ember-Plumed Shoes
ember-plumed-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. Using this item may grant temporary improvements to your stats.

embered-snapper.name: Embered Snapper
embered-snapper.description: A violent fish. Stories say these fish can bring down a mighty bear.

embla-hood.name: Embla Hood
embla-hood.description: Hood of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may decrease the damage you may inflict upon yourself.

embla-robe.name: Embla Robe
embla-robe.description: Robe of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing it may occasionally greatly increase one's power.

embla-shoes.name: Embla Shoes
embla-shoes.description: Shoes of Yggdrasil, the fallen symbol of life. Wearing them will keep one from becoming stunned.

emerald-pinion.name: Emerald Pinion
emerald-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional magic resistance at the expense of magical power.

emerald-trout.name: Emerald Trout
emerald-trout.description: A green-hued fish, slightly rarer than what one would usually see.

enchanted-skull.name: Enchanted Skull
enchanted-skull.description: A skull enchanted with strange magic. Attracts more monsters to you when carried.

endbringer.name: Endbringer
endbringer.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

eostres-circlet.name: Eostre's Circlet
eostres-circlet.description: Circlet of Eostre, warrior Goddess of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Eostre protected the fields and crops of Fomoria; crops that would ultimately grow the vessels of Fomoria's curse. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

estoc.name: Estoc
estoc.description: A simple straight sword, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.

esuss-pillar.name: Esus's Pillar
esuss-pillar.description: Second staff of Esus, Stone God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Esus constructed the mighty pillars of Fomoria, an architectural delight, truly. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

excalibur-32be53bc.name: Excalibur
excalibur-32be53bc.description: The mythic weapon of Arthus, the king of Avalon. It protects its wielder from bleeding.

exp-potion.name: EXP Potion
exp-potion.description: A sour tasting elixir that doubles experience earned for a limited time.

explorers-waystone.name: Explorer's Waystone
explorers-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Using it may guide you to something interesting.

eye-of-the-feyger.name: Eye of the Feyger
eye-of-the-feyger.description: Is it the thrill of the fight?

eye-of-the-morrigan.name: Eye of the Morrigan
eye-of-the-morrigan.description: A decaying adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

eyestone.name: Eyestone
eyestone.description: Crystal eye fallen from a great gazer. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

fail-not.name: Fail-not
fail-not.description: The bow of a long forgotten hero. It is now carried by Rouge, the crimson archer. Surely, one cannot miss a shot with this bow.

fairys-ring.name: Fairy's Ring
fairys-ring.description: An arcane ring often worn by a clurichaun. It increases both mana potential and dexterity.

fairys-tanto.name: Fairy's Tanto
fairys-tanto.description: Attack with a chance of causing poison.

fairys-wand.name: Fairy's Wand
fairys-wand.description: A curious wand carried by the foul Naggeneen. Spells cast with this wand may cause your opponent to become poisoned or blighted.

falchion.name: Falchion
falchion.description: A single edged sword with a curved blade, often used as a tool rather than in combat.

fallen-archistaff.name: Fallen Archistaff
fallen-archistaff.description: The archistaff of a powerful fallen mage.

fallen-armor.name: Fallen Armor
fallen-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-boots.name: Fallen Boots
fallen-boots.description: Boots worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-cowl.name: Fallen Cowl
fallen-cowl.description: Cowl worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-druids-staff.name: Fallen Druid's Staff
fallen-druids-staff.description: Staff of a fallen druid. It greatly increases mana.

fallen-garb.name: Fallen Garb
fallen-garb.description: Light armor worn by rogues of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-helmet.name: Fallen Helmet
fallen-helmet.description: Helmet worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-hood.name: Fallen Hood
fallen-hood.description: Hood worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-knights-axe.name: Fallen Knight's Axe
fallen-knights-axe.description: A large axe of a fallen knight.

fallen-leggings.name: Fallen Leggings
fallen-leggings.description: Leggings worn by knights of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-mages-staff.name: Fallen Mage's Staff
fallen-mages-staff.description: The trusty staff of a fallen mage.

fallen-robe.name: Fallen Robe
fallen-robe.description: Robe worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-rogues-bow.name: Fallen Rogue's Bow
fallen-rogues-bow.description: The longbow of a fallen rogue.

fallen-shield.name: Fallen Shield
fallen-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

fallen-shoes.name: Fallen Shoes
fallen-shoes.description: Shoes worn by acolytes of Mammon, the demon of hubris.

fallen-sky-armor.name: Fallen Sky Armor
fallen-sky-armor.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This armor grants its wearer additional Ward protection.

fallen-sky-boots.name: Fallen Sky Boots
fallen-sky-boots.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. When wearing these boots, one will deal additional damage to an opponent's Ward.

fallen-sky-cowl.name: Fallen Sky Cowl
fallen-sky-cowl.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this cowl will make critical hits slightly more effective.

fallen-sky-garb.name: Fallen Sky Garb
fallen-sky-garb.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Skills that enemies are weak against will deal additional damage while wearing this robe.

fallen-sky-headdress.name: Fallen Sky Headdress
fallen-sky-headdress.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this hood will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

fallen-sky-helmet.name: Fallen Sky Helmet
fallen-sky-helmet.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This helmet allows one to see slightly further.

fallen-sky-hood.name: Fallen Sky Hood
fallen-sky-hood.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. This hood allows one to see slightly further.

fallen-sky-leggings.name: Fallen Sky Leggings
fallen-sky-leggings.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. These leggings grant its wearer one Ward turn per turn in battle.

fallen-sky-legwraps.name: Fallen Sky Legwraps
fallen-sky-legwraps.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

fallen-sky-mail.name: Fallen Sky Mail
fallen-sky-mail.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

fallen-sky-robe.name: Fallen Sky Robe
fallen-sky-robe.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Spells that enemies are weak against will deal additional damage while wearing this robe.

fallen-sky-shoes.name: Fallen Sky Shoes
fallen-sky-shoes.description: 1000 years since shedding her feathers, Quetzalcoatl rises again under Medea's curse. Her remaining feathers can be used to protect oneself from the Great Dragons' blights. Spells cast while wearing these shoes will consume additional mana.

fallen-thiefs-dagger.name: Fallen Thief's Dagger
fallen-thiefs-dagger.description: The trusty dagger of a fallen thief.

fallen-wanderers-dagger.name: Fallen Wanderer's Dagger
fallen-wanderers-dagger.description: A sharp blade carried by wandering rogues. It has a great chance to cause an opponent to bleed.

fallen-warriors-sword.name: Fallen Warrior's Sword
fallen-warriors-sword.description: The trusty sword of an unfortunately fallen warrior.

false-kings-crown.name: False King's Crown
false-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

false-kings-sceptre.name: False King's Sceptre
false-kings-sceptre.description: The old staff of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship.

fancy-belt.name: Fancy Belt
fancy-belt.description: How could a piece of clothing make one so happy? This item will grant one proficiency to any weapon.

farsight.name: Farsight
farsight.description: A tonic that improves eyesight. Consuming this item will increase your view distance for a limited time.

feral-archistaff.name: Feral Archistaff
feral-archistaff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the feral Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

feral-claws.name: Feral Claws
feral-claws.description: Attack the opponent with unrelenting fury.

feral-hood.name: Feral Hood
feral-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the power of your follower.

feral-warsword.name: Feral Warsword
feral-warsword.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos. It greatly increases the rate in which a follower may act in battle.

ferguss-hammer.name: Fergus's Hammer
ferguss-hammer.description: Strike an enemy with the hilt of a weapon, increasing the chance to stun.

ferocious-bull.name: Ferocious Bull
ferocious-bull.description: The powerful, fiery staff of Cerus, the untamed bull.

ferocious-bulls-eye.name: Ferocious Bull's Eye
ferocious-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

ferocious-hood.name: Ferocious Hood
ferocious-hood.description: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

fey-arrows.name: Fey Arrows
fey-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 3 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

fey-badb-boots.name: Fey Badb Boots
fey-badb-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

fey-badb-catha.name: Fey Badb Catha
fey-badb-catha.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

fey-badb-garb.name: Fey Badb Garb
fey-badb-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

fey-badb-veil.name: Fey Badb Veil
fey-badb-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Badb, the great witch.

fey-badb-warbow.name: Fey Badb Warbow
fey-badb-warbow.description: Cursed greatbow of Badb, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional dexterity while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

fey-banshee-boots.name: Fey Banshee Boots
fey-banshee-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

fey-banshee-robe.name: Fey Banshee Robe
fey-banshee-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

fey-banshee-veil.name: Fey Banshee Veil
fey-banshee-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

fey-chimera-armor.name: Fey Chimera Armor
fey-chimera-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of Chimera remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.

fey-chimera-greaves.name: Fey Chimera Greaves
fey-chimera-greaves.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of Chimeric remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.

fey-chimera-helmet.name: Fey Chimera Helmet
fey-chimera-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of Chimera remains. Wearing this item increases the power of your follower.

fey-crowsong.name: Fey Crowsong
fey-crowsong.description: Cursed lute played by the sisters of Morrigan. It can grant one additional defenses while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

fey-dragon-armor.name: Fey Dragon Armor
fey-dragon-armor.description: A chest guard made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-boots.name: Fey Dragon Boots
fey-dragon-boots.description: Boots made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-chestmail.name: Fey Dragon Chestmail
fey-dragon-chestmail.description: A chest guard made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-cowl.name: Fey Dragon Cowl
fey-dragon-cowl.description: A cowl made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-helmet.name: Fey Dragon Helmet
fey-dragon-helmet.description: A helmet made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-hood.name: Fey Dragon Hood
fey-dragon-hood.description: A hood made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-leggings.name: Fey Dragon Leggings
fey-dragon-leggings.description: Heavy leg armor made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-mages-boots.name: Fey Dragon Mage's Boots
fey-dragon-mages-boots.description: Boots made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-dragon-robe.name: Fey Dragon Robe
fey-dragon-robe.description: A robe made of the remains of a great dragon lost to Morrigan. Wearing this item may cause your follower to act more often.

fey-eye.name: Fey Eye
fey-eye.description: A strange eye imbued with cursed magic. Keeping this in your hand will slightly boost all stats and protect you from blindness.

fey-gazing-staff.name: Fey Gazing Staff
fey-gazing-staff.description: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. It increases your ability to see, prevents blindness, and may occasionally increase your dexterity in battle.

fey-hellfire-armor.name: Fey Hellfire Armor
fey-hellfire-armor.description: Chapter VII: Orochi, with the minds of three, created the Tatzelwurms to assist the Great Dragons in the creation of these lands. 1000 years later, this would make him a target of Morrigan's curse. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

fey-hellfire-boots.name: Fey Hellfire Boots
fey-hellfire-boots.description: Chapter VII: Orochi, with the minds of three, created the Tatzelwurms to assist the Great Dragons in the creation of these lands. 1000 years later, this would make him a target of Morrigan's curse. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

fey-hellfire-cowl.name: Fey Hellfire Cowl

fey-yeti-coat.description: Coat reminiscent of the cursed Yeti. It protects one from having their magical resistance lowered and reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

fey-yeti-horns.name: Fey Yeti Horns
fey-yeti-horns.description: Headwear decorated with the horns of a great Yeti. Healing items will recover more HP and mana while wearing these horns. They are also well suited for adornment.

final-horsemans-armor.name: Final Horseman's Armor
final-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

final-horsemans-scythe.description: Scythe of the Fourth Horseman, often associated with untimely demise. It is suitable for both attacking and casting spells, reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses, and has a small chance to curse an opponent.

fine-greatsword.name: Fine Greatsword
fine-greatsword.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.

fine-whetstone.name: Fine Whetstone
fine-whetstone.description: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon from level 2 to 3.

finesse-katana.name: Finesse Katana
finesse-katana.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.

finesses-enchanted-epee.name: Finesse's Enchanted Epee
finesses-enchanted-epee.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This epee is one of them.

finesses-greatsword.name: Finesse's Greatsword
finesses-greatsword.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This greatsword is one of them.

finesses-katana.name: Finesse's Katana
finesses-katana.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This katana is his favorite, and can easily weaken an opponent.

finesses-shotel.name: Finesse's Shotel
finesses-shotel.description: The blademaster Finesse is known for carrying an inhuman amount of swords upon his back. This crooked shotel is one of them.

finns-spear.name: Finn's Spear
finns-spear.description: Attack with your weapon extended, dealing moderate damage but mitigating damage from your opponent's next attack.

fire-arrows.name: Fire Arrows
fire-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

firepike.name: Firepike
firepike.description: This pike of Pyre is eternally lit. Has a very high chance of causing an opponent to burn.

firestone.name: Firestone
firestone.description: A rare piece of firestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

first-horsemans-armor.name: First Horseman's Armor
first-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the First Horseman, often associated with great famine. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

fishing-line.name: Fishing Line

fjalar-mantle.name: Fjalar Mantle
fjalar-mantle.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a fjalar. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

furious-cuirass.description: Armor of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

furious-helmet.name: Furious Helmet
furious-helmet.description: Helmet of Cerus, the raging bull. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

gadget.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gadget prevents one from having their defense lowered.

gaia-robe.description: Adorned robe of an infamous Gaia of the Earthen Legion.

galars-hammer.description: A fine hammer used by Galar. Using this item before upgrading equipment at the blacksmith will reduce the time needed to complete the upgrades.

gales-spear.name: Gale's Spear
gales-spear.description: Spear of Gale, the Stormforce elite. It has a high chance of paralyzing an opponent.

gamma-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

gamma-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

gamma-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

gamma-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.
