gamma-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

gamma-olympia-shoes.name: Gamma Olympia Shoes
gamma-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

gamma-olympia-vestment.name: Gamma Olympia Vestment
gamma-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

gamma-olympia-warbow.name: Gamma Olympia Warbow
gamma-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

gamma-olympia-warsword.name: Gamma Olympia Warsword
gamma-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

gandring.name: Gandring
gandring.description: Deals arcane damage and may cause curse.

gargouilles-dagger.name: Gargouille's Dagger
gargouilles-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

gauntlet-key.name: Gauntlet Key
gauntlet-key.description: One can use this key to enter a Gauntlet.

gazing-staff.name: Gazing Staff
gazing-staff.description: A powerful staff adorned with a crystal eye. Increases your ability to see.

genius.name: Genius
genius.description: The easily recognizable pole-arm of Cade, the great Avalonian inventor. Its hidden features can cause a variety of status effects.

gizmo.name: Gizmo
gizmo.description: One of the concoctions of Cade, the great inventor. This gizmo prevents one from having their physical or magical prowess lowered.

glacial-staff.name: Glacial Staff
glacial-staff.description: A staff of the Frozenguard that is eternally frozen.

gladiators-shotel.name: Gladiator's Shotel
gladiators-shotel.description: A shotel carried by a cunning gladiator. Shotels can easily pierce through an opponent's defenses.

gladiators-sword.name: Gladiator's Sword
gladiators-sword.description: A sword carried by a talented gladiator. Through its might, an opponent's stats can be lowered.

glaive.name: Glaive
glaive.description: A curved blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

globe-holder.name: Globe Holder
globe-holder.description: Take the stance of Atlas, disabling your ability to use Ward, but locking it in place.

gobannos-heavy-boots.name: Gobannos' Heavy Boots
gobannos-heavy-boots.description: Large boots of Gobannos, smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Gobannos constructed the crops' heavy gates and fences, ultimately containing Fomoria's curse within. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

goblin-lords-staff.name: Goblin Lord's Staff
goblin-lords-staff.description: The staff of the Goblin Lord. It slightly boosts its wielder's mana.

goibhniu-armguard.name: Goibhniu Armguard
goibhniu-armguard.description: Armguard of Goibhniu, warrior smith God of the Fomorian house of Sumner. Goibhniu crafted the house's mighty swords, hammers, and axes. While wearing this item, skills that target multiple opponents will deal additional damage. Additionally, skills will seldomly hit more than one opponent.

gold-pinion.name: Gold Pinion
gold-pinion.description: A feather pulled from the remains of a cursed Cockatrice. It grants additional physical defense at the expense of attack power.

golden-crystal.name: Golden Crystal
golden-crystal.description: Golden crystal of the sun. Increases physical prowess at the expense of magical ability.

gradlons-archistaff.name: Gradlon's Archistaff
gradlons-archistaff.description: Deals holy damage, recovers Ward, and recovers a percentage of damage dealt. An opponent may also be blinded from the light.

grand-armor.name: Grand Armor
grand-armor.description: Armor fit for a court's guard.

grand-attuning-hood.name: Grand Attuning Hood
grand-attuning-hood.description: Hood worn by novice summoners. It slightly increases the power of summoned beasts.

grand-attuning-robe.name: Grand Attuning Robe
grand-attuning-robe.description: Robe worn by novice summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

grand-attuning-shoes.name: Grand Attuning Shoes
grand-attuning-shoes.description: Shoes worn by novice summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

grand-helmet.name: Grand Helmet
grand-helmet.description: A helmet fit for a court's guard.

grand-leggings.name: Grand Leggings
grand-leggings.description: Leg armor fit for a court's guard.

grand-summoners-hood.name: Grand Summoner's Hood
grand-summoners-hood.description: Hood worn by advanced summoners. When wearing this hood, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

grand-summoners-robe.name: Grand Summoner's Robe
grand-summoners-robe.description: Robe worn by advanced summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

grand-summoners-shoes.name: Grand Summoner's Shoes
grand-summoners-shoes.description: Shoes worn by advanced summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

grand-sword.name: Grand Sword
grand-sword.description: A broad sword fit for a court's guard.

great-antlers.name: Great Antlers
great-antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

great-bearskin.name: Great Bearskin
great-bearskin.description: Protective armor made of the hide of a great bear.

great-empty-bottle.name: Great Empty Bottle
great-empty-bottle.description: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

great-fishing-hat.name: Great Fishing Hat
great-fishing-hat.description: A simple hat, suitable for an angler. It will increase your luck while fishing.

great-fishing-line.name: Great Fishing Line
great-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

great-jinn-staff.name: Great Jinn Staff
great-jinn-staff.description: Magical staff of a great Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.

great-mimic-head.name: Great Mimic Head
great-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or items.

great-monster-remains.name: Great Monster Remains
great-monster-remains.description: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used. Bosses summoned with this item will give slightly less rewards than those found in the world.

great-monster-tome.name: Great Monster Tome
great-monster-tome.description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

great-orcish-axe.name: Great Orcish Axe
great-orcish-axe.description: Blunt axe of a great Orcish warrior.

great-orcish-blade.name: Great Orcish Blade
great-orcish-blade.description: Blunt blade of a great Orcish warrior.

great-phoenician-boots.name: Great Phoenician Boots
great-phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-cowl.name: Great Phoenician Cowl
great-phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-cuirass.name: Great Phoenician Cuirass
great-phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-garb.name: Great Phoenician Garb
great-phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-greaves.name: Great Phoenician Greaves
great-phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-helmet.name: Great Phoenician Helmet
great-phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-hood.name: Great Phoenician Hood
great-phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-robe.name: Great Phoenician Robe
great-phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenician-shield.name: Great Phoenician Shield
great-phoenician-shield.description: Decorated shield of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded or lit ablaze.

great-phoenician-shoes.name: Great Phoenician Shoes
great-phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

great-phoenixsong.name: Great Phoenixsong
great-phoenixsong.description: A decorated flute often used to lull the great Phoenix. Although it seemingly has little power, it is well suited for adornment.

great-staff.name: Great Staff
great-staff.description: A staff favored by archmages of older times.

greatbow.name: Greatbow
greatbow.description: Large bow often carried by rangers of the wood.

greater-attack-tonic.name: Greater Attack Tonic
greater-attack-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your attack in battle.

greater-bulls-eye.name: Greater Bull's Eye
greater-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

greater-magic-tonic.name: Greater Magic Tonic
greater-magic-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.

greater-soul.name: Greater Soul
greater-soul.description: Soul of a great felled gladiator. Useful in upgrading rarer weapons and equipment.

greater-wisp-staff.name: Greater Wisp Staff
greater-wisp-staff.description: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.description: An extremely heavy sword, that must be wielded with all your might.

green-crystal.name: Green Crystal
green-crystal.description: An odd green crystal. Boosts magic power when equipped.

green-eye-of-kerberos.name: Green Eye of Kerberos
green-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to rot.

green-feather.name: Green Feather
green-feather.description: The feather of a Buzzard. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

green-gem.name: Green Gem
green-gem.description: An odd green gem. Raises magic power when equipped.

griffin-crested-shield.name: Griffin Crested Shield
griffin-crested-shield.description: A shield crested with the image of a Griffin. It protects one against Dragon attacks while boosting Ward.

grioarvolr.name: Grioarvolr
grioarvolr.description: A staff that brings down giants. It may break an opponents magical defenses.

gungnir.name: Gungnir
gungnir.description: Attack with your weapon extended, dealing moderate damage but mitigating damage from your opponent's next attack.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.description: An axe blade atop a long pole. Useful for keeping distance while striking.

hallowed-blade.name: Hallowed Blade
hallowed-blade.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

hallowed-candle.name: Hallowed Candle
hallowed-candle.description: When lit, this mysterious candle draws stronger enemies to you for a limited time. Monsters defeated with this candle lit also give more experience.

hallowed-monster-tome.name: Hallowed Monster Tome
hallowed-monster-tome.description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

hallowed-witchs-hat.name: Hallowed Witch's Hat
hallowed-witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of a nameless witch. It can protect one from status effects caused by the four basic elements.

hammer.name: Hammer
hammer.description: A large hammer suitable for crushing blows.

handy-waystone.name: Handy Waystone
handy-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most helpful of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to inn quest monster locations.

hard-leather-armor.name: Hard Leather Armor
hard-leather-armor.description: Light armor reinforced with hardened leather. Offers fair protection from the elements.

hard-leather-boots.name: Hard Leather Boots
hard-leather-boots.description: Sturdy leather boots. Offers extra protection.

hardened-steel.name: Hardened Steel
hardened-steel.description: Steel, yet seemingly more durable than usual. Useful in upgrading stronger weapons.

hardwood-lute.name: Hardwood Lute
hardwood-lute.description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's defenses.

harpys-feathers.name: Harpy's Feathers
harpys-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a harpy. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

heart-of-eos.name: Heart of Eos
heart-of-eos.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Eos drove a mighty chariot powered by her mighty horses, the Phaethons. She searched the continents for tower materials, never having difficulty delivering them home.

This piece will increase the power of your summons.

heart-of-oceanus.name: Heart of Oceanus
heart-of-oceanus.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Oceanus raised the great seas; crashing waves against the towers to test their might. He cooled the artifacts of Prometheus's Kiln, and forced the tower pieces into place with great tidal force.

This augment allows one to break the maximum damage limit.

heart-of-prometheus.name: Heart of Prometheus
heart-of-prometheus.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Prometheus operated a great kiln, molding stone, steel, and ortanite needed by the Titans into great pieces of the great towers. Ultimately, it is said his synthetic flesh became a kiln in itself.

This piece increases one's resistance to status effects.

heart-of-selene.name: Heart of Selene
heart-of-selene.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Selene had a certain way with the wildlife surrounding the towers. With the help of the birds, the trees, the hunters, and the prey -- she never felt deficient of help.

This piece will allow your follower to make more intelligent decisions in battle.

heart-of-themis.name: Heart of Themis
heart-of-themis.description:
The Olympians constructed many great Titans to construct their towers to the skies. Few titans remain animated today.

Titan Themis, of law and order, balanced the tower planes into place with her shoulders. A plane mustn't lean down to Balor, nor up to skies. A level floor bequeaths the next level floor.

This piece allows one to recover both HP and Mana when taking Ward damage.

heavy-arrows.name: Heavy Arrows
heavy-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

heavy-boots.name: Heavy Boots
heavy-boots.description: Heavy boots, made to endure most weather conditions.

heimdalls-shield.name: Heimdall's Shield
heimdalls-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

helhest.name: Helhest
helhest.description: The mighty bow of Hel. Its loosed arrows will light your path while exploring the world.

hellfire-armor.name: Hellfire Armor
hellfire-armor.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-boots.name: Hellfire Boots
hellfire-boots.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-cowl.name: Hellfire Cowl
hellfire-cowl.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-garb.name: Hellfire Garb
hellfire-garb.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-helmet.name: Hellfire Helmet
hellfire-helmet.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-hood.name: Hellfire Hood
hellfire-hood.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-leggings.name: Hellfire Leggings
hellfire-leggings.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-robe.name: Hellfire Robe
hellfire-robe.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hellfire-shoes.name: Hellfire Shoes
hellfire-shoes.description: Chapter II: Steadfast and diligent, the Tatzelwurms worked tirelessly to level Lotan's coiled rock. Wearing this armor will improve the relationship between followers and Valhallan classes, allowing them a greater chance to choose the right action for your situation.

hels-boots.name: Hel's Boots
hels-boots.description: Footwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

hels-feathers.name: Hel's Feathers
hels-feathers.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

hels-garb.name: Hel's Garb
hels-garb.description: Light armor of Hel, the shadowed rogue. It grants its wearer additional dexterity and status immunities. Additionally, it is well suited for adornment.

hels-veil.name: Hel's Veil
hels-veil.description: Headwear of Hel, the shadowed rogue. Wearing it may increase one's chance of landing a critical attack.

heretics-jewel.name: Heretic's Jewel
heretics-jewel.description: An adornment of the blasphemous. When adorned upon a weapon, it grants the chance to inflict damage to an opponent's magical resistance.

heretics-robe.name: Heretic's Robe
heretics-robe.description: A decorated robe often worn by the Heretics. It grants additional magic power, but spells cast will consume more mana.

hermes-coin-purse.name: Hermes' Coin Purse
hermes-coin-purse.description: A bag for coins, carried by Hermes the merchant. Slightly raises gold earned.

hide.name: Hide
hide.description: A small scrap of animal hide. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

high-draconian-cowl.name: High Draconian Cowl
high-draconian-cowl.description: A cowl of a Draconian rogue.

high-draconian-garb.name: High Draconian Garb
high-draconian-garb.description: Body coverings of a Draconian rogue.

high-draconian-hood.name: High Draconian Hood
high-draconian-hood.description: A hood of a Draconian mage.

high-draconian-robe.name: High Draconian Robe
high-draconian-robe.description: A robe of a Draconian mage.

high-draconian-staff.name: High Draconian Staff
high-draconian-staff.description: A staff of a Draconian mage. Boasts above average magic power.

high-draconian-sword.name: High Draconian Sword
high-draconian-sword.description: A sword of a Draconian blacksmith. The quality is quite surprising.

high-fomorian-armor.name: High Fomorian Armor
high-fomorian-armor.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

high-fomorian-cowl.name: High Fomorian Cowl
high-fomorian-cowl.description: A hood worn by Fomorian rogues.

high-fomorian-garb.name: High Fomorian Garb
high-fomorian-garb.description: Heavy armor worn by Fomorian rogues.

high-fomorian-hood.name: High Fomorian Hood
high-fomorian-hood.description: A hood worn by Fomorian mages.

high-fomorian-leggings.name: High Fomorian Leggings
high-fomorian-leggings.description: Leg armor worn by Fomorian warriors.

high-fomorian-robe.name: High Fomorian Robe
high-fomorian-robe.description: A robe worn by Fomorian mages.

high-fomorian-staff.name: High Fomorian Staff
high-fomorian-staff.description: A staff of a Fomorian mage.

high-fomorian-sword.name: High Fomorian Sword
high-fomorian-sword.description: A sword of a Fomorian warrior.

high-phoenician-boots.name: High Phoenician Boots
high-phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-cowl.name: High Phoenician Cowl
high-phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-cuirass.name: High Phoenician Cuirass
high-phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-garb.name: High Phoenician Garb
high-phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-greaves.name: High Phoenician Greaves
high-phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-helmet.name: High Phoenician Helmet
high-phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-hood.name: High Phoenician Hood
high-phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-robe.name: High Phoenician Robe
high-phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenician-shield.name: High Phoenician Shield
high-phoenician-shield.description: Decorated shield of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded or lit ablaze.

high-phoenician-shoes.name: High Phoenician Shoes
high-phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

high-phoenixsong.name: High Phoenixsong
high-phoenixsong.description: A decorated flute often used to lull the great Phoenix. Although it seemingly has little power, it is well suited for adornment.

hiltless.name: Hiltless
hiltless.description: A curved blade without a hilt. Wielding it may bring harm to oneself, occasionally causing Bloodshift.

hood-of-wolves.name: Hood of Wolves
hood-of-wolves.description: Hood of a wolfman. Offers decent physical defense.

horned-armor.name: Horned Armor
horned-armor.description: Armor of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

horned-helmet.name: Horned Helmet
horned-helmet.description: Helmet of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

horned-hood.name: Horned Hood
horned-hood.description: Hood of Cerus, the untamed. It reduces the mana cost of skills or spells and is well suited for adornment.

horror.name: Horror
horror.description: An incredibly dreadful staff forged of the remains of sunken travelers. It may cause fallen beasts to drop more items.

horuss-robe.name: Horus's Robe
horuss-robe.description: Ivory robe of Horus, the winged protector of the skies. What it lacks in defensive power is made up with dexterity.

huge-empty-bottle.name: Huge Empty Bottle
huge-empty-bottle.description: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

hurricane-arc.name: Hurricane Arc
hurricane-arc.description: A bow signifying the great Griffin of the skies. Arrows shot from this bow can easily knock an opponent off-guard.

hydra-staff.name: Hydra Staff
hydra-staff.description: Archistaff forged of the remains of a great Hydra. It can provide one with various elemental resistances.

ice-arrows.name: Ice Arrows
ice-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

ichaival.name: Ichaival
ichaival.description: Bow of the underworld. It has a good chance of breaking an opponents defenses.

ichor.name: Ichor
ichor.description: A restorative elixir that removes any stat lowering ailments against you.

ifrits-feet.name: Ifrit's Feet
ifrits-feet.description: Boots of an infamous Ifrit of the Inferno Knights.

imagination.name: Imagination
imagination.description: An extremely odd staff, carried by a cryptid mimic. It can occasionally cause unpredicted status effects.

immortal-boots.name: Immortal Boots
immortal-boots.description: Boots of an Immortal warrior. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

immortal-garb.name: Immortal Garb
immortal-garb.description: Light armor of an Immortal warrior. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

immortal-hat.name: Immortal Hat
immortal-hat.description: Infamous headwear of an Immortal warrior. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

immortal-hood.name: Immortal Hood
immortal-hood.description: Hood of an Immortal mage. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

immortal-katana.name: Immortal Katana
immortal-katana.description: The blade of an ageless warrior. It may pierce the defenses of an opponent.

immortal-robe.name: Immortal Robe
immortal-robe.description: Robe of an Immortal mage. The Immortals are warriors of a great fallen Empire. Their equipment can prevent one from losing their sight.

immortals-jewel.name: Immortal's Jewel
immortals-jewel.description: An adornment capable of increasing the HP granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

immortals-ring.name: Immortal's Ring
immortals-ring.description: An ageless ring of an Immortal Lord. It grants additional life at the expense of other stats.

imonas-slippers.name: Imona's Slippers
imonas-slippers.description: Soft slippers of Imona, waking Goddess of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Imona was blessed with the fortune of a life of unneeded sleep. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

incarnate-archistaff.name: Incarnate Archistaff
incarnate-archistaff.description: Heavy archistaff crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

incarnate-boots.name: Incarnate Boots
incarnate-boots.description: Mystical boots crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

incarnate-hood.name: Incarnate Hood
incarnate-hood.description: Mystical hood crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

incarnate-robe.name: Incarnate Robe
incarnate-robe.description: Mystical robe crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

infernal-boots.name: Infernal Boots
infernal-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the heat. Grants protection from fire.

iron-hammer.name: Iron Hammer
iron-hammer.description: A large hammer suitable for crushing blows.

iron-ring.name: Iron Ring
iron-ring.description: A standard ring. You feel slightly stronger while wearing it. Slightly raises defense.

iron.name: Iron
iron.description: A small piece of iron ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

ithras-blade.name: Ithra's Blade
ithras-blade.description: Thin, cold blade of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

ithras-staff.name: Ithra's Staff
ithras-staff.description: Thin, cold staff of Ithra, the White Knight. Ithra established the Frozenguard to combat the Draconian invasion.

jesters-outfit.name: Jester's Outfit
jesters-outfit.description: Amusing outfit of a court jester. It increases gold earned.

jewel-of-aqua.name: Jewel of Aqua
jewel-of-aqua.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to freeze an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-arcana.name: Jewel of Arcana
jewel-of-arcana.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to paralyze, rot, burn, or freeze an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-attrition.name: Jewel of Attrition
jewel-of-attrition.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to lower an opponent's defenses when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-avalon.name: Jewel of Avalon
jewel-of-avalon.description: A small adornment of Avalon capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-celestria.name: Jewel of Celestria
jewel-of-celestria.description: A small adornment of the stars capable of increasing the magical power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-creation.name: Jewel of Creation
jewel-of-creation.description: Chapter XI: As the sky formed over this new land, the powers of these Great Dragons combined to form the Ymir Amphiptere. The Ur Amphiptere created the night sky and brought weather to the lands.

jewel-of-defense.name: Jewel of Defense
jewel-of-defense.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the defense power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-draconia.name: Jewel of Draconia
jewel-of-draconia.description: A small adornment of Draconia capable of increasing the attack power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-erosion.name: Jewel of Erosion
jewel-of-erosion.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to lower an opponent's magical defenses when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-fira.name: Jewel of Fira
jewel-of-fira.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to burn an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-fomoria.name: Jewel of Fomoria
jewel-of-fomoria.description: A small adornment of Fomoria capable of increasing the magical defense of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-growth.name: Jewel of Growth
jewel-of-growth.description: A small adornment capable of granting additional experience earned to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-health.name: Jewel of Health
jewel-of-health.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the HP granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-mana.name: Jewel of Mana
jewel-of-mana.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the mana granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-natura.name: Jewel of Natura
jewel-of-natura.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to rot an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-opportunity.name: Jewel of Opportunity
jewel-of-opportunity.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the critical attack rate of a weapon when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-pale.name: Jewel of Pale
jewel-of-pale.description: A small adornment of Balor capable of increasing the dexterity and Ward of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-resistance.name: Jewel of Resistance
jewel-of-resistance.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the magic defense of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-silencing.name: Jewel of Silencing
jewel-of-silencing.description: A small adornment capable of granting a weapon the ability to lower an opponent's magic power when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-sparring.name: Jewel of Sparring
jewel-of-sparring.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to lower an opponent's attack when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-speed.name: Jewel of Speed
jewel-of-speed.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the dexterity of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-storma.name: Jewel of Storma
jewel-of-storma.description: A small adornment capable of granting the ability to paralyze an opponent to a piece of equipment when adorned.

jewel-of-strength.name: Jewel of Strength
jewel-of-strength.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the attack power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-the-deep.name: Jewel of the Deep
jewel-of-the-deep.description: A small adornment of the deep sea capable of increasing the magical defenses of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-the-end.name: Jewel of the End
jewel-of-the-end.description: A destructive adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-titania.name: Jewel of Titania
jewel-of-titania.description: A small adornment of the Titans capable of increasing the defenses of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-ward.name: Jewel of Ward
jewel-of-ward.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the Ward provided by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jewel-of-wisdom.name: Jewel of Wisdom
jewel-of-wisdom.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the magic power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

jinn-staff.name: Jinn Staff
jinn-staff.description: Magical staff of a Jinn. This weapon may cause unexpected status effects.

jolly-stockings.name: Jolly Stockings
jolly-stockings.description: Socks of a generous and plump man.

jotunheim-mnemonic.name: Jotunheim Mnemonic

kerberos-hood.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.

kerberos-staff-23282b8f.name: Kerberos Staff
kerberos-staff-23282b8f.description: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

kerberos-staff.description: Mighty staff, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

kerberos-sword-fa67ff37.description: Mighty sword, representative of the relentless Kerberos.

kerberos-veil.description: A durable hood forged of the remains of the relentless Kerberos. It protects its wearer from becoming frozen.

kobold-hood.name: Kobold Hood
kobold-hood.description: A simple hood worn by kobold mages.

labrys.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

landmark-waystone.description: A stone that can place a magic beacon at any location. Using it will place a temporary marker to your current location on your compass.

lasting-lantern.name: Lasting Lantern
lasting-lantern.description: A special lantern that can attract all sorts of beings.

leach.name: Leach

leaches.name: Leaches
leaches.description: A sharp pair of daggers. They slightly drain HP from an enemies with damage dealt.

leather-belt.name: Leather Belt
leather-belt.description: A leather belt. Improves your dexterity.

leather-boots.name: Leather Boots
leather-boots.description: These boots were only made for walking.

leather.name: Leather
leather.description: A small scrap of leather. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

legs-of-eos.name: Legs of Eos
legs-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

legs-of-prometheus.name: Legs of Prometheus
legs-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

legs-of-selene.name: Legs of Selene
legs-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase the power of your followers.

legs-of-themis.name: Legs of Themis
legs-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

leros-hood.name: Lero's Hood
leros-hood.description: Hood of Lero, apprentice God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Lero, untrained, youthful, and rather brash, was quick to fall during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

lesser-balorite.name: Lesser Balorite
lesser-balorite.description: A golden material useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

lesser-jewel-of-defense.name: Lesser Jewel of Defense
lesser-jewel-of-defense.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the defense power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-health.name: Lesser Jewel of Health
lesser-jewel-of-health.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the HP granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-mana.name: Lesser Jewel of Mana
lesser-jewel-of-mana.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the mana granted by a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-resistance.name: Lesser Jewel of Resistance
lesser-jewel-of-resistance.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the magic defense of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-speed.name: Lesser Jewel of Speed
lesser-jewel-of-speed.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the dexterity of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-strength.name: Lesser Jewel of Strength
lesser-jewel-of-strength.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the attack power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

lesser-jewel-of-wisdom.name: Lesser Jewel of Wisdom
lesser-jewel-of-wisdom.description: A small adornment capable of increasing the magic power of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

leviathan-cuirass.name: Leviathan Cuirass
leviathan-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of an infamous Leviathan of the Frozenguard.

lifeshaker.name: Lifeshaker
lifeshaker.description: A terribly frightening axe, seemingly forged with the hardened bones of an odok undead. It has a great chance of stunning an opponent.

lightningstone.name: Lightningstone
lightningstone.description: A rare piece of lightningstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

lightstone.name: Lightstone
lightstone.description: A glossy white material used in Ljosalfar weaponry.

liver-of-prometheus.name: Liver of Prometheus
liver-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to recover more HP and mana when using curatives.

ljosalfar-garb.name: Ljosalfar Garb
ljosalfar-garb.description: Light armor of a Ljosalfar warrior.

ljosalfar-sceptre.name: Ljosalfar Sceptre
ljosalfar-sceptre.description: An extremely versatile magical Ljosalfar sceptre. Can be used as either a magic staff or weapon.

ljosalfar-staff.name: Ljosalfar Staff
ljosalfar-staff.description: Great staff of a Ljosalfar mage.

ljosalfar-sword.name: Ljosalfar Sword
ljosalfar-sword.description: A gleaming white blade of a Ljosalfar warrior.

lordly-monster-tome.name: Lordly Monster Tome
lordly-monster-tome.description: A large tome of monster knowledge. Increases experience earned.

lost-art.name: Lost Art
lost-art.description: A thin blade favored by an Arcanic. It greatly increases the damage of critical hits.

lost-helmet.name: Lost Helmet

lovers-lost.name: Lover's Lost
lovers-lost.description: A luring charm made by Ceres to attract a certain powerful Fallen hero. Wearing it will attract additional monsters.

lucky-coin.name: Lucky Coin

lucky-silver-coin.name: Lucky Silver Coin

lugus-gauntlet.name: Lugus Gauntlet
lugus-gauntlet.description: Gauntlet of the Balor knight Lugus. Wearing it will provide a chance to greatly increase your offensive power.

lunar-boots.name: Lunar Boots
lunar-boots.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.

lunar-dagger.name: Lunar Dagger
lunar-dagger.description: An azure dagger crafted of hard titanium.

lunar-garb.name: Lunar Garb
lunar-garb.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.

lunar-helmet.name: Lunar Helmet
lunar-helmet.description: Azure light armor crafted of titanium.

lungs-of-eos.name: Lungs of Eos
lungs-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase the power of your summons.

lungs-of-oceanus.name: Lungs of Oceanus
lungs-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to occasionally cast spells in one less turn.

lungs-of-selene.name: Lungs of Selene
lungs-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase frequency that your follower will act in battle.

lungs-of-themis.name: Lungs of Themis
lungs-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to start battle with Ward activated and slightly recover Ward each turn.

lute.name: Lute
lute.description: A simple bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporarily boost one's attack or magic.

lyonesse-boots.name: Lyonesse Boots
lyonesse-boots.description: Silent boots of a Lyonesse assassin.

lyonesse-cowl.name: Lyonesse Cowl
lyonesse-cowl.description: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.

lyonesse-crown.name: Lyonesse Crown
lyonesse-crown.description: The famed Crown of King Gradlon. Gradlon left Avalon to form the kingdom of Lyonesse a century ago. It is rumored that Lyonesse still stands, without their beloved King.

lyonesse-garb.name: Lyonesse Garb
lyonesse-garb.description: Light armor of a Lyonesse assassin.

lyonesse-greaves.name: Lyonesse Greaves
lyonesse-greaves.description: Leg armor of a Lyonesse knight.

lyonite.name: Lyonite
lyonite.description: A golden ore favored in use of forging Lyonesse weapons and armor.

lyons-penance.name: Lyon's Penance
lyons-penance.description: An artifact capable of unmarking one from Lyonesse execution.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: A blunt weapon suitable for heavy blows.

macha-boots.name: Macha Boots

macha-pillar.name: Macha Pillar
macha-pillar.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

macha-robe.name: Macha Robe
macha-robe.description: Cursed robe of a follower of Macha, the great witch.

macha-veil.name: Macha Veil
macha-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Macha, the great witch.

macha-warstaff.name: Macha Warstaff
macha-warstaff.description: Cursed staff of Macha, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional magic power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

magic-defense-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic defense in battle.

magic-tonic.name: Magic Tonic
magic-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your magic in battle.

magicians-hood.name: Magician's Hood
magicians-hood.description: The hood of a student of magic.

magicians-robe.name: Magician's Robe
magicians-robe.description: A simple robe worn by students of magic.

magicians-shoes.name: Magician's Shoes
magicians-shoes.description: Simple shoes worn by students of magic.

mammons-teardrop.name: Mammon's Teardrop
mammons-teardrop.description: A relic of Mammon capable of granting a piece of equipment additional power while occasionally lowering an opponent's attack or magical power.

mana-bow.name: Mana Bow
mana-bow.description: The bow of a mystic. It slightly raises your dexterity.

mandrake.name: Mandrake
mandrake.description: A single leaf of mandrake. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

maras-blessing.name: Mara's Blessing
maras-blessing.description: A charm imbued with Seeker Mara's magic. It will both help you see farther while increasing the life and mana healed by potions.

masamune.name: Masamune
masamune.description: A beautiful blade that resemble stars in the night sky.

merchants-waystone.description: A stone imbued with the most curious of magic. Use it to set a compass marker to the nearest shop in the world.

meteor-armor.name: Meteor Armor
meteor-armor.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

meteor-hammer.name: Meteor Hammer
meteor-hammer.description: An exquisite hammer forged of meteoric solarite.

meteor-helmet.name: Meteor Helmet
meteor-helmet.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

meteor-leggings.name: Meteor Leggings
meteor-leggings.description: Exquisite armor forged of meteoric solarite.

might.name: Might

mightiest-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items, gold, orns, and experience.

mighty-ensemble.name: Mighty Ensemble
mighty-ensemble.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

mighty-fishing-line.name: Mighty Fishing Line
mighty-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

mighty-griffin-shield.name: Mighty Griffin Shield
mighty-griffin-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

mighty-hands-of-themis.name: Mighty Hands of Themis
mighty-hands-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

mighty-mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more items, gold, orns, and experience.

mighty-tempest.description: A bow signifying the great Griffin of the skies. Arrows shot from this bow can easily knock an opponent off-guard.

mimic-head.name: Mimic Head
mimic-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or items.

mimic-king-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or orns.

mimic-king-of-kings-head.description: Head of a mimic. When wearing it, you may find more gold or orns.

monster-remains.name: Monster Remains
monster-remains.description: Fragrant remains of a fallen monster. Attracts a boss to your location when used. Bosses summoned with this item will give slightly less rewards than those found in the world.

monster-tome.name: Monster Tome
monster-tome.description: A tome of common monsters. Slightly boosts experience earned.

moon-staff.name: Moon Staff
moon-staff.description: An azure staff crafted of hard titanium.

moondust.name: Moondust
moondust.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

morning-star.name: Morning Star
morning-star.description: A deadly spiked ball on a chain.

mystic-katar.name: Mystic Katar
mystic-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

mystics-ring.name: Mystic's Ring
mystics-ring.description: A strange magical ring. Those who do not possess physical strength can equip this ring to sacrifice magic for attack power.

mythril-amulet.name: Mythril Amulet
mythril-amulet.description: A rare amulet made of mythril. Raises attack power.

mythril-armor.name: Mythril Armor
mythril-armor.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

mythril-bow.name: Mythril Bow
mythril-bow.description: A sturdy bow forged with mythril.

mythril-dagger.name: Mythril Dagger
mythril-dagger.description: A fine dagger forged of mythril.

mythril-hammer.name: Mythril Hammer
mythril-hammer.description: A large hammer made of mythril.

mythril-helmet.name: Mythril Helmet
mythril-helmet.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

mythril-leggings.name: Mythril Leggings
mythril-leggings.description: Silver armor that is quite protective.

mythril-ring.name: Mythril Ring
mythril-ring.description: A ring made of mythril. Raises defense when worn.

mythril-sword.name: Mythril Sword
mythril-sword.description: A fine sword forged of mythril.

mythril.name: Mythril
mythril.description: A small piece of mythril ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

naga-halberd.name: Naga Halberd
naga-halberd.description: Crude weapon of a Naga warrior.

naga-staff.name: Naga Staff
naga-staff.description: Crude staff of a Naga mage.

nagamaki.name: Nagamaki
nagamaki.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

naggeneens-brew.name: Naggeneen's Brew
naggeneens-brew.description: A incredibly foul drink concocted by Naggeneen. It heavily poisons its consumer, but raises some stats.

naggeneens-hat.name: Naggeneen's Hat
naggeneens-hat.description: Headwear of the mischievous clurichaun, Naggeneen. It protects its wearer from both poison and toxicity.

naggeneens-song.name: Naggeneen's Song
naggeneens-song.description: Unkept instrument carried by the filthy Naggeneen.

nekromancers-staff.name: Nekromancer's Staff
nekromancers-staff.description: A staff often used in forbidden magic. It slightly increases the power of summons and pacts with your summons.

neman-cuirass.name: Neman Cuirass
neman-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

neman-greaves.name: Neman Greaves
neman-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

neman-havoc.name: Neman Havoc
neman-havoc.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

neman-helmet.name: Neman Helmet
neman-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Neman, the great witch.

neman-warsword.name: Neman Warsword
neman-warsword.description: Cursed greatsword of Neman, sister to Morrigan. It can grant one additional attack power while having the adverse effect on an opponent.

nemans-protection.name: Neman's Protection
nemans-protection.description: Cursed shield of a follower of Neman, the great witch. It offers protection from being put to sleep.

nightbreak-71e7e93d.name: Nightbreak
nightbreak-71e7e93d.description: A powerful dark archistaff of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

nightbreak-9492da49.name: Nightbreak
nightbreak-9492da49.description: A powerful dark sword of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

nightbreak.name: Nightbreak
nightbreak.description: A powerful dark greatbow of unknown royalty. It grants one immunity from blindness and falling asleep in battle.

nightshade.name: Nightshade
nightshade.description: A stalk of nightshade. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

nightstone.name: Nightstone
nightstone.description: A hard stone that resembles the night sky.

niskus-boots.name: Niskus' Boots
niskus-boots.description: Boots of Niskus, river God of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Niskus was untrusted to the bitter end, ultimately being the traiter to poison Fomoria's crops, spreading curse from within. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

nocturna-crested-shield.name: Nocturna Crested Shield
nocturna-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

nolans-staff.name: Nolan's Staff
nolans-staff.description: Staff o' the Gnome Master, Nolan. 'Ave one 'ver seen such a wonder? Spells cast o' this staff'll miss less often.

north-star.name: North Star
north-star.description: Converts half of your available mana into damage against an opponent.

nostrum.name: Nostrum
nostrum.description: Some say the Cure-all is a bit of snake oil. This concoction aims to cure its drinker of many ailments.

nothren-shield.name: Nothren Shield
nothren-shield.description: Shield carried by berserkers of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

nu-olympia-archistaff.name: Nu Olympia Archistaff
nu-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

nu-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-cowl.name: Nu Olympia Cowl
nu-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-garb.name: Nu Olympia Garb
nu-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-helmet.name: Nu Olympia Helmet
nu-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-hood.name: Nu Olympia Hood
nu-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-shoes.name: Nu Olympia Shoes
nu-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-vestment.name: Nu Olympia Vestment
nu-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

nu-olympia-warbow.name: Nu Olympia Warbow
nu-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

nu-olympia-warsword.name: Nu Olympia Warsword
nu-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

occult-candle.description: A mysterious candle that draws more enemies to you for a limited time when lit.

oceanic-boots.name: Oceanic Boots
oceanic-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the tides. Grants protection from water & ice.

ogmios-satin-robe.name: Ogmios' Satin Robe
ogmios-satin-robe.description: Soft robe of Ogmios, eloquence God of the Fomorian house of Wintara. Ogmios, mentor to Lero, wasn't much for a fight and quickly vanished during Morrigan's invasion. While wearing this item, buffs cast by its wearer may transfer to a party mate. Additionally, positive status effects will last longer.

ogre-axe.name: Ogre Axe
ogre-axe.description: A crude axe of an ogre.

oisin-crown.name: Oisin Crown
oisin-crown.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

old-hallowed-blade.name: Old Hallowed Blade
old-hallowed-blade.description: Attack with both hands gripped tightly, dealing paltry to immense damage. Requires 2 turns in battle.

old-mace.name: Old Mace
old-mace.description: A blunt weapon suitable for heavy blows.

old-nothren-crown.name: Old Nothren Crown
old-nothren-crown.description: The crown of a former Nothren King. It protects one from having their magic or attack powers weakened.

old-olympia-armor.name: Old Olympia Armor
old-olympia-armor.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-olympia-headdress.name: Old Olympia Headdress
old-olympia-headdress.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

old-olympia-helmet.name: Old Olympia Helmet
old-olympia-helmet.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-olympia-hood.name: Old Olympia Hood
old-olympia-hood.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-olympia-leggings.name: Old Olympia Leggings
old-olympia-leggings.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-olympia-legwraps.name: Old Olympia Legwraps
old-olympia-legwraps.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

old-olympia-mantle.name: Old Olympia Mantle
old-olympia-mantle.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Ophion's influence will give additional power to both your follower, or the minions you summon.

old-olympia-robe.name: Old Olympia Robe
old-olympia-robe.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-olympia-shoes.name: Old Olympia Shoes
old-olympia-shoes.description: Old and worn Olympia attire, found in the crater of a Titan's fall. Its weathered facade may give one unconventional protection.

old-spear.name: Old Spear
old-spear.description: A blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

olympia-mnemonic.name: Olympia Mnemonic
olympia-mnemonic.description: Bundled, distorted memories of the Titans of Olympia crafted by Pythia. Using it will restore a Titan from fragmented memories, granting you a follower.

olympia-tower-key.name: Olympia Tower Key
olympia-tower-key.description: To ascend a tower of Olympia, we must first open the door.

olympian-tower-joist.name: Olympian Tower Joist
olympian-tower-joist.description: Take the stance of Asteria, increasing your magic power but losing a great amount of defenses. Additionally, mana will burn away each turn.

omega-myrddin-cloak.name: Omega Myrddin Cloak
omega-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

omega-myrddin-cowl.name: Omega Myrddin Cowl
omega-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

omega-myrddin-harp.name: Omega Myrddin Harp
omega-myrddin-harp.description: Harp found in Merlin's eccentric collection. It can grant elemental protection.

omega-myrddin-hood.name: Omega Myrddin Hood
omega-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

omega-myrddin-robe.name: Omega Myrddin Robe
omega-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

omega-myrddin-shield.name: Omega Myrddin Shield
omega-myrddin-shield.description: A relic of Merlin's eccentric collection.

omega-myrddin.name: Omega Myrddin
omega-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

omega-olympia-archistaff.name: Omega Olympia Archistaff
omega-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

omega-olympia-boots.name: Omega Olympia Boots
omega-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-cowl.name: Omega Olympia Cowl
omega-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-cuirass.name: Omega Olympia Cuirass
omega-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-garb.name: Omega Olympia Garb
omega-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-greaves.name: Omega Olympia Greaves
omega-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-helmet.name: Omega Olympia Helmet
omega-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-hood.name: Omega Olympia Hood
omega-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-shoes.name: Omega Olympia Shoes
omega-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-vestment.name: Omega Olympia Vestment
omega-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

omega-olympia-warbow.name: Omega Olympia Warbow
omega-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

omega-olympia-warsword.name: Omega Olympia Warsword
omega-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

omega-riftlock.name: Omega Riftlock
omega-riftlock.description: A complete Riftlock. Riftlocks were carried by those who tended to the Rift, and grant one powers akin to those of the Judges themselves. When carried by summoners, this item will occasionally remove the casting time needed to summon beasts. Additionally, this item provides a great amount of Ward.

ophion-banner.name: Ophion Banner
ophion-banner.description: Take the stance of Ophion, potentially dispersing any status effect received to your summoned minions.

orange-pinion.name: Orange Pinion
orange-pinion.description: A fallen feather of the great Phoenix. It can grant a weapon additional attributes when adorned upon it.

orcish-axe.name: Orcish Axe
orcish-axe.description: Blunt axe of an Orcish warrior.

orcish-blade.name: Orcish Blade
orcish-blade.description: Blunt blade of an Orcish warrior.

orichalcum-helmet.name: Orichalcum Helmet
orichalcum-helmet.description: A helmet made of solid orichalcum.

orichalcum-leggings.name: Orichalcum Leggings
orichalcum-leggings.description: Leg armor made of solid orichalcum.

orichalcum.name: Orichalcum
orichalcum.description: A solid chunk of orichalcum. Useful in upgrading hardened equipment.

ortanite-armor.name: Ortanite Armor
ortanite-armor.description: Armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

ortanite-greaves.name: Ortanite Greaves
ortanite-greaves.description: Leg armor forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

ortanite-helmet.name: Ortanite Helmet
ortanite-helmet.description: Helmet forged of the remains of a Ortanite golem. It boasts strong physical defense at the sacrifice of magical defense.

ortanite.name: Ortanite
ortanite.description: The great blacksmith Creidhne created this alloy to forge the most powerful of weapons.

oxen-axe.name: Oxen Axe
oxen-axe.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

pale-armor.name: Pale Armor
pale-armor.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

pale-eye-of-kerberos.name: Pale Eye of Kerberos
pale-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It can grant a weapon additional properties when adorned upon it.

pale-helmet.name: Pale Helmet
pale-helmet.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

pale-leggings.name: Pale Leggings
pale-leggings.description: Pale armor of elite Balor warriors.

paleblade.name: Paleblade
paleblade.description: A pale blade often used by the most elite of Balor knights.

palm-tree-branch.name: Palm Tree Branch
palm-tree-branch.description: Take the stance of Aegir, greatly increasing defenses at the expense of offensive power.

parrying-dagger.name: Parrying Dagger
parrying-dagger.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

perfect-baldur.name: Perfect Baldur
perfect-baldur.description: A perfect chunk of Baldur, favored by the raiders of Nothren. It is useful for upgrading powerful equipment.

perfect-fishing-line.name: Perfect Fishing Line
perfect-fishing-line.description: A very strong fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

perfect-runestone.name: Perfect Runestone
perfect-runestone.description: A flawless chunk of runestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

phantom-blinders.name: Phantom Blinders
phantom-blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a Kelpie's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

phoenician-boots.name: Phoenician Boots
phoenician-boots.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-cowl.name: Phoenician Cowl
phoenician-cowl.description: Headwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-cuirass.name: Phoenician Cuirass
phoenician-cuirass.description: Heavy armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-garb.name: Phoenician Garb
phoenician-garb.description: Light armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-greaves.name: Phoenician Greaves
phoenician-greaves.description: Heavy leg armor of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-helmet.name: Phoenician Helmet
phoenician-helmet.description: Helmet of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-hood.name: Phoenician Hood
phoenician-hood.description: Hood of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-robe.name: Phoenician Robe
phoenician-robe.description: Robe of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenician-shield.name: Phoenician Shield
phoenician-shield.description: Decorated shield of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix. It protects one from being blinded or lit ablaze.

phoenician-shoes.name: Phoenician Shoes
phoenician-shoes.description: Footwear of a worshipper of the mighty Phoenix.

phoenixsong.name: Phoenixsong
phoenixsong.description: A decorated flute often used to lull the great Phoenix. Although it seemingly has little power, it is well suited for adornment.

piece-of-string.name: Piece of String
piece-of-string.description: A piece of string, possibly for use in fishing. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

plagued-cuirass.name: Plagued Cuirass
plagued-cuirass.description: Cursed heavy armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

plagued-greaves.name: Plagued Greaves
plagued-greaves.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

plagued-helmet.name: Plagued Helmet
plagued-helmet.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

platinum-amulet.name: Platinum Amulet
platinum-amulet.description: A rare platinum amulet. Raises attack power.

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.description: A small piece of platinum ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

poison-arrows.name: Poison Arrows
poison-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

poison-dagger.name: Poison Dagger
poison-dagger.description: A simple dagger, encrusted in a thick poison.

polished-aegis.name: Polished Aegis
polished-aegis.description: An ageless golden shield capable of protecting one from petrification.

polished-mirror.name: Polished Mirror
polished-mirror.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Reflections are more successful when magic users attempt them.

polluxs-greataxe.name: Pollux's Greataxe
polluxs-greataxe.description: Azure greataxe of Pollux, the Dioscuri berserker. Pollux and his twin brother seldomly leave the depths of the seas unless truly lacking in other hobbies.

presents.name: Presents!
presents.description: Gifts for you and me. Greatly boosts the chance for monsters to drop items. Additionally, you may find extra materials from defeating monsters in the world.

psi-olympia-archistaff.name: Psi Olympia Archistaff
psi-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

psi-olympia-boots.name: Psi Olympia Boots
psi-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

psi-olympia-cowl.name: Psi Olympia Cowl
psi-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.
