psi-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

psi-olympia-shoes.name: Psi Olympia Shoes
psi-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

psi-olympia-vestment.name: Psi Olympia Vestment
psi-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

psi-olympia-warbow.name: Psi Olympia Warbow
psi-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

psi-olympia-warsword.name: Psi Olympia Warsword
psi-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

pure-darkstone.name: Pure Darkstone
pure-darkstone.description: Pure darkstone. Useful for upgrading extremely dark weapons.

pure-draconite.name: Pure Draconite
pure-draconite.description: A rare chunk of pure draconite. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

pure-lightstone.name: Pure Lightstone
pure-lightstone.description: Rare white material used in Ljosalfar weaponry. Can be used to upgrade powerful weapons.

pure-waterstone.name: Pure Waterstone
pure-waterstone.description: A rare chunk of pure waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading powerful magical weapons or armor.

questing-axe.name: Questing Axe
questing-axe.description: A powerful axe forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

questing-bow.name: Questing Bow
questing-bow.description: A powerful bow forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

questing-license.name: Questing License
questing-license.description: A simple piece of parchment given to you by Samson. Using this item will temporarily improve the gold, orns, and experience earned when completing quests.

questing-staff.name: Questing Staff
questing-staff.description: A powerful staff forged of the remains of Glatisant, the questing beast. Wielding it will slightly increase the amount of experience, gold, and orns earned.

racul-blade.name: Racul Blade
racul-blade.description: An evil blade wielded by Racul, King of vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.

raging-bull.name: Raging Bull
raging-bull.description: The powerful, fiery axe of Cerus, the untamed bull. It has a good chance of stunning or burning an opponent.

raging-bulls-eye.name: Raging Bull's Eye
raging-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

rangers-greatbow.name: Ranger's Greatbow
rangers-greatbow.description: Large, precise bow often carried by rangers of the wood.

rapier.name: Rapier
rapier.description: A simple rapier, useful for sparring. It has a great chance at catching an opponent off guard.

ras-cane.name: Ra's Cane
ras-cane.description: The trusty cane of Ra, the seer. Ra was obsessed with the senses of humans after losing much of his own. This staff increases your ability to see, while potentially blinding your opponent.

raven-boots.name: Raven Boots
raven-boots.description: Cursed legwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

raven-garb.name: Raven Garb
raven-garb.description: Cursed light armor of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

raven-veil.name: Raven Veil
raven-veil.description: Cursed headwear of a follower of Morrigan, the great witch.

ravens-feathers.name: Raven's Feathers
ravens-feathers.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a raven. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

realm-boots.name: Realm Boots
realm-boots.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

realm-cowl.name: Realm Cowl
realm-cowl.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

realm-garb.name: Realm Garb
realm-garb.description: Light armor crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

realm-katana.name: Realm Katana
realm-katana.description: Dark katana crafted by Apollyon, the destructive exiled Balor mystic. Apollyon sought to destroy lands to stop the falling, but was exiled for his unorthodox approaches.

realm-katar.name: Realm Katar
realm-katar.description: Grants a chance to return a portion of an opponent's attack back at them. Counterattacks are favorable to win in PvP draws.

realm-ore.name: Realm Ore
realm-ore.description: A strange dark and warm ore refined by Balor mystics. It is useful in upgrading equipment of the exiled.

realmcrystal.name: Realmcrystal
realmcrystal.description: An oddly shaped crystal fallen from Olympia. Using it will allow one to return to another Realm without wait.

realmspikes.name: Realmspikes
realmspikes.description: Lay spikes around your opponent, potentially greatly increasing damage and the chance for a critical strike.

reapers-robe.name: Reaper's Robe
reapers-robe.description: The blackened robe of Ankou, the henchman of Death. Slightly increases orns earned. It is most fitting for the most skilled of mages.

reapers-scythe.name: Reaper's Scythe
reapers-scythe.description: The followers of Ankou are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

reaping-sickle.name: Reaping Sickle
reaping-sickle.description: The followers of Apollyon are fearsome, and this great scythe is their chosen weapon. It has a high chance of causing an opponent to bleed.

red-crystal.name: Red Crystal
red-crystal.description: An odd red crystal. Boosts HP when equipped.

red-dagger.name: Red Dagger
red-dagger.description: A small blade ideal for close quartered combat. This one in particular is imbued with fire.

red-draconite.name: Red Draconite
red-draconite.description: A chunk of fiery draconite. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

red-eye-of-kerberos.name: Red Eye of Kerberos
red-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to cause an opponent to burn.

red-feather.name: Red Feather
red-feather.description: The feather of a Carrion Crow. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

red-gem.name: Red Gem
red-gem.description: An odd red gem. Raises HP when equipped.

red-pinion.name: Red Pinion
red-pinion.description: A fallen feather of the great Phoenix. It can grant a piece of armor additional attributes when adorned upon it.

reinbow.name: Reinbow
reinbow.description: A great hunting bow carried by followers of Scruug. Arrows loosed from this bow will miss less often.

rhada-shade-greatshield.name: Rhada Shade Greatshield
rhada-shade-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

rhada-shade-greatsword.name: Rhada Shade Greatsword
rhada-shade-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

rhada-shadow-greatshield.name: Rhada Shadow Greatshield
rhada-shadow-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

rhada-shadow-greatsword.name: Rhada Shadow Greatsword
rhada-shadow-greatsword.description: Stomp one foot down, taking a defensive position and reducing damage for 1 turn. On the next turn, deliver a powerful strike.

rhongomiant.name: Rhongomiant
rhongomiant.description: Great staff of Avalon court mages.

rift-summoner-boots.name: Rift Summoner Boots
rift-summoner-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When standing strong with these boots, your summons will be slightly stronger.

rift-summoner-helmet.name: Rift Summoner Helmet
rift-summoner-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this helmet, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

rift-summoner-plate.name: Rift Summoner Plate
rift-summoner-plate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Charon. When wearing this armor, your summons will be more likely to protect you.

riftguard-armor.name: Riftguard Armor
riftguard-armor.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, one will take reduced self damage from status effects.

riftguard-helmet.name: Riftguard Helmet
riftguard-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

riftguard-leggings.name: Riftguard Leggings
riftguard-leggings.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Rhada. When taking Ward damage while wearing this armor, HP and Mana will be recovered by a percentage of the Ward damage taken.

riftrogue-boots.name: Riftrogue Boots
riftrogue-boots.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

riftrogue-chestplate.name: Riftrogue Chestplate
riftrogue-chestplate.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

riftrogue-helmet.name: Riftrogue Helmet
riftrogue-helmet.description: A piece of Judge's attire worn by Achlys. One may move with extra grace when wearing this armor, decreasing your chance to miss your mark.

ring-of-annwn.name: Ring of Annwn
ring-of-annwn.description: A ring of Annwn royalty. Its arcane enchantment grants the immunity to element status conditions.

ring-of-dawn.name: Ring of Dawn
ring-of-dawn.description: Ring of the King of Light. It helps one get a little extra step in the morning.

ring-of-day.name: Ring of Day
ring-of-day.description: Ring of the King of Light. It can protect one from having their defenses lowered.

ring-of-dusk.name: Ring of Dusk
ring-of-dusk.description: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It provides extra mana to help get through the night.

ring-of-night.name: Ring of Night
ring-of-night.description: Ring of the Queen of Darkness. It can protect one from having their physical or magical prowess decreased.

ring-of-restraint.name: Ring of Restraint
ring-of-restraint.description: A ring that inhibits growth, greatly reducing the amount of experience earned while slightly increasing orns, gold, and items found.

ring-of-sacrifice.name: Ring of Sacrifice
ring-of-sacrifice.description: A ring of certain evil. Wearing it attracts stronger monsters to you, but reduces your overall power.

robe-of-the-north.name: Robe of the North
robe-of-the-north.description: Magical attire of Nothren lords. It protects one from fire, the weakness of the Nothren people.

rosas-brooch.name: Rosa's Brooch
rosas-brooch.description: Lunar Catalyst of Rosa, fallen queen of the Enlightened.

rosewood-lute.name: Rosewood Lute
rosewood-lute.description: A talented bard's lute, playing it in battle may temporary boost one's stats.

rotten-leaves.name: Rotten Leaves
rotten-leaves.description: A clump of smelly old leaves.

royal-boots.name: Royal Boots
royal-boots.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-chestplate.name: Royal Chestplate
royal-chestplate.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-dagger.name: Royal Dagger
royal-dagger.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-helmet.name: Royal Helmet
royal-helmet.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-hood.name: Royal Hood
royal-hood.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-longbow.name: Royal Longbow
royal-longbow.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royal-shield.name: Royal Shield
royal-shield.description: The royal families often employed the use of rogues, arming them with pieces of great quality.

royalty.name: Royalty
royalty.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

ruby-wand.name: Ruby Wand
ruby-wand.description: A wand for casting magic. This one in particular is imbued with fire.

ruby.name: Ruby
ruby.description: A jewel with a crimson glow. Adorning this upon a weapon will slightly heal your wounds when damaging an opponent.

rune-armor.name: Rune Armor
rune-armor.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

rune-helmet.name: Rune Helmet
rune-helmet.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

rune-leggings.name: Rune Leggings
rune-leggings.description: Mystical armor that boasts higher magic defense.

rune-shield.name: Rune Shield
rune-shield.description: Mystical shield that boasts extra magic defense.

runestone.name: Runestone
runestone.description: A rare piece of runestone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

runic-boots.name: Runic Boots
runic-boots.description: The boots of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

runic-hat.name: Runic Hat
runic-hat.description: The hat of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

runic-robe.name: Runic Robe
runic-robe.description: The robe of a mage of a lost race known as the Runics. Wearing this item will slightly reduce the mana cost of spells. It is also well suited for adornment.

sabrinas-cowl.name: Sabrina's Cowl
sabrinas-cowl.description: Headwear of Sabrina, river Goddess of the Fomorian house of Autumna. Sabrina and her sisters traversed the riverways, tunnels, and creeks to get the edge in battle, but Morrigan's forces were far too plentiful. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

salas-hood.name: Sala's Hood
salas-hood.description: Ivory hood of Sala, the High Elf.

salas-robe.name: Sala's Robe
salas-robe.description: Crimson robe of Sala, the High Elf.

sandstone.name: Sandstone
sandstone.description: Material made of hardened sand. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: A rare scimitar of the sands. Slightly increases gold earned.

sanguine-archistaff.name: Sanguine Archistaff
sanguine-archistaff.description: A large staff wielded by kobold lords.

sanguine-staff.name: Sanguine Staff
sanguine-staff.description: A simple staff wielded by kobold mages.

sanguine-sword.name: Sanguine Sword
sanguine-sword.description: A simple sword wielded by kobold warriors.

satis-antlers.name: Satis Antlers
satis-antlers.description: This unique headwear does not offer much protection, but is well suited for adornment.

saturns-eye.name: Saturn's Eye
saturns-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

scalestone.name: Scalestone
scalestone.description: A chunk of nearly fossilized scales. Useful for upgrading rare weapons.

scimitar.name: Scimitar
scimitar.description: A short sword with a curved blade, designed for horseback combat.

scorcher.name: Scorcher
scorcher.description: This sword of the Inferno Knights is eternally ablaze.

scroll-of-chaos.name: Scroll of Chaos
scroll-of-chaos.description: A scroll containing a terrible incantation that will turn the world crimson. Using this scroll will cause enemies of any habitat to show for a limited time, but may be more difficult to defeat.

scythe.name: Scythe
scythe.description: A large tool quite suitable for cutting grass.

sea-axe.name: Sea Axe
sea-axe.description: An axe enchanted with the power of the raging sea.

sea-bass.name: Sea Bass
sea-bass.description: A medium sized fish, often seen in larger bodies of water.

second-horsemans-armor.name: Second Horseman's Armor
second-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

second-horsemans-boots.name: Second Horseman's Boots
second-horsemans-boots.description: Boots of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

second-horsemans-cloak.name: Second Horseman's Cloak
second-horsemans-cloak.description: Cloak of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

second-horsemans-hood.name: Second Horseman's Hood
second-horsemans-hood.description: Hood of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

second-horsemans-staff.name: Second Horseman's Staff
second-horsemans-staff.description: Staff of the Second Horseman, often associated with great pestilence. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can cause an opponent to be poisoned or blighted.

seekers-candle.name: Seeker's Candle
seekers-candle.description: When lit, this candle is said to draw near monsters that you have accepted a quest for.

sempre-forte.name: Sempre Forte
sempre-forte.description: A relic of Apollyon's less destructive years.

sequanas-chestpiece.name: Sequana's Chestpiece
sequanas-chestpiece.description: Masterly smithed chest armor of Sequana, river Goddess and leader of the Fomorian house of Autumna. The oldest of her sisters, Sequana was a deity of grace and fortune. While wearing this item, debuffs will be easier to cast on your opponent. Additionally, it increases the maximum damage of status effects on your opponent.

shadow-boots.name: Shadow Boots
shadow-boots.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

shadow-garb.name: Shadow Garb
shadow-garb.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

shadow-hood.name: Shadow Hood
shadow-hood.description: Dark armor of elite Balor rogues.

shadow-katana.name: Shadow Katana
shadow-katana.description: A thin, pale blade granted to elite Balor warriors.

shamans-charm.name: Shaman's Charm
shamans-charm.description: An amulet carried by most talented of healers. Wearing this item will increase the effectiveness of healing items.

sharpened-kerberos-claws.name: Sharpened Kerberos Claws
sharpened-kerberos-claws.description: Sharp, jagged blades forged of the mighty claws of Kerberos. They can cause an opponent to bleed or become frozen.

shivas-bow.name: Shiva's Bow
shivas-bow.description: A decorative bow enchanted with the power of ice. It can easily cause an opponent to freeze.

shoulders-of-eos.name: Shoulders of Eos
shoulders-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will allow your summons to protect you more frequently.

shoulders-of-oceanus.name: Shoulders of Oceanus
shoulders-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

shoulders-of-prometheus.name: Shoulders of Prometheus
shoulders-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

shoulders-of-selene.name: Shoulders of Selene
shoulders-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase frequency that your follower will act in battle.

shoulders-of-themis.name: Shoulders of Themis
shoulders-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This augment will increase the amount of damage dealt with Holy attacks and spells.

side-arm.name: Side-arm
side-arm.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

sigma-olympia-archistaff.name: Sigma Olympia Archistaff
sigma-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

sigma-olympia-boots.name: Sigma Olympia Boots
sigma-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-cowl.name: Sigma Olympia Cowl
sigma-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-cuirass.name: Sigma Olympia Cuirass
sigma-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-garb.name: Sigma Olympia Garb
sigma-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-greaves.name: Sigma Olympia Greaves
sigma-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-helmet.name: Sigma Olympia Helmet
sigma-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-hood.name: Sigma Olympia Hood
sigma-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-shoes.name: Sigma Olympia Shoes
sigma-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-vestment.name: Sigma Olympia Vestment
sigma-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

sigma-olympia-warbow.name: Sigma Olympia Warbow
sigma-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

sigma-olympia-warsword.name: Sigma Olympia Warsword
sigma-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

silk-crossbow.name: Silk Crossbow
silk-crossbow.description: A sturdy crossbow fastened with a thread of strong silk.

silk.name: Silk
silk.description: Silk of a great spider. Useful for upgrading rare weapons.

silphium.name: Silphium
silphium.description: A sprig of silphium. It is useful in crafting some potions at a herbalist.

silver-amulet.name: Silver Amulet
silver-amulet.description: A shiny, silver amulet. Raises attack power.

silver-crossbow.name: Silver Crossbow
silver-crossbow.description: A silver crossbow especially effective against the undead.

silver-dagger.name: Silver Dagger
silver-dagger.description: A silver dagger. Quite suitable when fighting the undead.

silver-kris.name: Silver Kris
silver-kris.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

silver.name: Silver
silver.description: A small piece of silver ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

simple-robe.name: Simple Robe
simple-robe.description: A simple mage's robe. Offers a small amount of magic protection.

simple-shoes.name: Simple Shoes
simple-shoes.description: A simple pair of trusty shoes.

skyshard-dagger.name: Skyshard Dagger
skyshard-dagger.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

skyshard-lute.name: Skyshard Lute
skyshard-lute.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

skyshard-quarterstaff.name: Skyshard Quarterstaff
skyshard-quarterstaff.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

skyshard-staff.name: Skyshard Staff
skyshard-staff.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

skyshard-sword.name: Skyshard Sword
skyshard-sword.description: A brittle weapon, constructed of Skyshards. With great vises, a Titan can augment it to fit your needs.

skyshard.name: Skyshard
skyshard.description: A piece of Skyshard refined from a piece of a Tower of Olympia.

skystone.name: Skystone
skystone.description: Material imbued by the windy skies. Useful for upgrading powerful weapons.

sleighblade.name: Sleighblade
sleighblade.description: A glistening sword carried by followers of Scruug. It is quite chilling to the touch. When using this weapon, you will start battle with Ward automatically activated.

small-bestial-potion.name: Small Bestial Potion
small-bestial-potion.description: A sweet and nutritious tonic. Having your follower consume it will increase their action rate for a limited time.

small-empty-bottle.name: Small Empty Bottle
small-empty-bottle.description: A small bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

smelly-mushroom.name: Smelly Mushroom
smelly-mushroom.description: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will cause one to enrage, but become afflicted with Toxic.

smelly-shoes.name: Smelly Shoes
smelly-shoes.description: Foul shoes worn by the fairy Naggeneen. Oddly, they can protect their wearer from poison and blight.

snakeskin-armor.name: Snakeskin Armor
snakeskin-armor.description: Armor made of great snake's remains.

snakeskin-cowl.name: Snakeskin Cowl
snakeskin-cowl.description: A cowl made of great snake's remains.

solar-boots.name: Solar Boots
solar-boots.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

solar-bow.name: Solar Bow
solar-bow.description: A bow imbued with celestial might.

solar-garb.name: Solar Garb
solar-garb.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

solar-hood.name: Solar Hood
solar-hood.description: Light armor imbued with celestial might.

solar-secrets.name: Solar Secrets
solar-secrets.description: A scroll of destructive solar magic crafted by Emile. Using it will grant the skills "Solarstrikes" and "Solarseals".

solarite.name: Solarite
solarite.description: Rare chunk of solarite. Useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

soul-blade.name: Soul Blade
soul-blade.description: Ceremonial blade of a long forgotten civilization. It has a small chance of cursing an opponent.

soul-of-achlys.name: Soul of Achlys
soul-of-achlys.description: Soul of Achlys, the Red Dagger. Adorning this soul within your weapon will increase light and dark damage.

soul-of-charon.name: Soul of Charon
soul-of-charon.description: Soul of Charon, the Grand Summoner. Adorning this soul within your weapon will slightly increase the power of your summons.

soul-of-rhada.name: Soul of Rhada
soul-of-rhada.description: Soul of Rhada, the Great Shield. Adorning this soul within your armor will decrease light and dark damage taken.

soul.name: Soul
soul.description: Soul of a felled gladiator. Useful in upgrading rarer weapons and equipment.

sour-mushroom.name: Sour Mushroom
sour-mushroom.description: A mushroom of Naggeneen's collection. Eating it will greatly increase one's attack and magic powers, but become afflicted with a variety of illnesses.

spear.name: Spear
spear.description: A blade fashioned upon an extended shaft of wood.

spectral-armor.name: Spectral Armor
spectral-armor.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-boots.name: Spectral Boots
spectral-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-cowl.name: Spectral Cowl
spectral-cowl.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-garb.name: Spectral Garb
spectral-garb.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-heavy-boots.name: Spectral Heavy Boots
spectral-heavy-boots.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-helmet.name: Spectral Helmet
spectral-helmet.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-hood.name: Spectral Hood
spectral-hood.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-robe.name: Spectral Robe
spectral-robe.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

spectral-shoes.name: Spectral Shoes
spectral-shoes.description: A piece threaded of distant memories. Memories of the famed, yet feared, "Angel" of destruction. In his youth, Apollyon favored vitality and dexterity over orthodox defenses.

speed-tonic.name: Speed Tonic
speed-tonic.description: A sour tonic that raises your speed in battle.

spellswords-ring.name: Spellsword's Ring
spellswords-ring.description: A strange magical ring. Those who are not trained in magical arts can equip this ring to sacrifice physical strength for magic power.

spelunking-staff.name: Spelunking Staff
spelunking-staff.description: Staff of a lost dungeon explorer. It seems to have developed quite some power while resting deep within the land.

spiked-greatshield.name: Spiked Greatshield
spiked-greatshield.description: Recovers Ward. Requires 2 turns in battle.

spine-of-eos.name: Spine of Eos
spine-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

spine-of-oceanus.name: Spine of Oceanus
spine-of-oceanus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

spine-of-prometheus.name: Spine of Prometheus
spine-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

spine-of-selene.name: Spine of Selene
spine-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

spine-of-themis.name: Spine of Themis
spine-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

spirit-of-the-wood.name: Spirit of the Wood
spirit-of-the-wood.description: Ceremonial sword of a great woodland elf. It may poison an opponent.

spore.name: Spore
spore.description: A spore of a toxic mushroom. Adorning it upon a weapon can add a variety of status effects to your attacks.

staff-of-the-chimera.name: Staff of the Chimera
staff-of-the-chimera.description: A powerful staff forged of the remains of a Chimera. Using this weapon may cause one to fill with immense rage, inflicting the Berserk status.

staff-of-tiamat.name: Staff of Tiamat
staff-of-tiamat.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Tiamat, the great ancient dragon.

staff-of-typhon.name: Staff of Typhon
staff-of-typhon.description: A superb staff forged of the remains of Typhon, the great ancient dragon.

staff-of-wolves.name: Staff of Wolves
staff-of-wolves.description: Staff of a wolfman mage. Imbued with earthen powers.

staff-of-zaltys.name: Staff of Zaltys
staff-of-zaltys.description: Chapter V: Zaltys never did like the Agathodaemon, but understood that she needed the soil for life. Zaltys laid seed to the soil, sprouting the foliage that lets us breath our air. Her staff represents life, and will allow you to recover HP each turn in battle.

stardust.name: Stardust
stardust.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

steadfast-charm.name: Steadfast Charm
steadfast-charm.description: A yellow crystal carried by some of the most steadfast. Carrying this item may occasionally protect you from status effects.

steady-hands-of-eos.name: Steady Hands of Eos
steady-hands-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

steady-hands-of-prometheus.name: Steady Hands of Prometheus
steady-hands-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece will increase the power of critical hits.

steady-hands-of-selene.name: Steady Hands of Selene
steady-hands-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

steady-pendant.name: Steady Pendant
steady-pendant.description: A sturdy pendant often worn by centurions. It protects its wearer from being stunned.

steel-belt.name: Steel Belt
steel-belt.description: A belt fashioned with steel. Improves your dexterity and defense.

steel-ring.name: Steel Ring
steel-ring.description: A ring made of steel. Raises defense when worn.

steel.name: Steel
steel.description: A small piece of steel ore. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

steelguard.name: Steelguard
steelguard.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

steward-candle.name: Steward Candle
steward-candle.description: A candle gifted by Damra as part of the Steward ritual. Light it to summon your Steward.

stilettos.name: Stilettos
stilettos.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage.

stone-cure.name: Stone Cure
stone-cure.description: A simple tonic that cures one of petrification.

stone-dagger.name: Stone Dagger
stone-dagger.description: A dagger, once a fixture upon a noble statue. It has a small chance of petrifying an opponent.

stone-pendant.name: Stone Pendant
stone-pendant.description: A pendant often worn against the mighty cockatrice. It protects its wearer from petrification.

stone.name: Stone
stone.description: A solid piece of stone. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

storm-arrows.name: Storm Arrows
storm-arrows.description: Deals damage thrice, grants 2 turns of Ward, and may temporarily increase dexterity.

storm-belt.name: Storm Belt
storm-belt.description: Belt of Stormforce. Grants protection from lightning.

storm-sceptre.name: Storm Sceptre
storm-sceptre.description: A staff that harnesses the power lurking above the wielder.

strangers-gift.name: Stranger's Gift
strangers-gift.description: A gift for another. Open it to find out what it could be.

strong-fishing-line.name: Strong Fishing Line
strong-fishing-line.description: A stronger fishing line, suitable for fetching aught from the seas. Use when near a body of water or fountain to begin fishing.

sturdy-feet-of-eos.name: Sturdy Feet of Eos
sturdy-feet-of-eos.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to occasionally summon beasts in one less turn.

sturdy-feet-of-prometheus.name: Sturdy Feet of Prometheus
sturdy-feet-of-prometheus.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to recover Ward with each turn.

sturdy-feet-of-selene.name: Sturdy Feet of Selene
sturdy-feet-of-selene.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop.

sturdy-feet-of-themis.name: Sturdy Feet of Themis
sturdy-feet-of-themis.description: A piece of a Titan themself. These pieces can be used to augment celestial weapons at a Titan Workshop. This piece allows one to take reduced damage when defending in battle.

succubus-mantle.name: Succubus Mantle
succubus-mantle.description: Crude armor made of the remains of a succubus. Does not offer much defense, but raises your dexterity.

summoners-hood.name: Summoner's Hood
summoners-hood.description: Hood worn by advanced summoners. When wearing this hood, using pacts with your summons will be more effective.

summoners-robe.name: Summoner's Robe
summoners-robe.description: Robe worn by advanced summoners. It increases the chance of a summon protecting you in battle.

summoners-shoes.name: Summoner's Shoes
summoners-shoes.description: Shoes worn by advanced summoners. They slightly increase the power of summoned beasts.

summoning-scroll.name: Summoning Scroll
summoning-scroll.description: A scroll containing the ancient Balor techniques of the summon. Reading it will summon a powerful Raid Boss to your nearby area, but the entity may only be visible to those who travel at a slower pace.

sumner-crested-shield.name: Sumner Crested Shield
sumner-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

sun-boots.name: Sun Boots
sun-boots.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

sun-hat.name: Sun Hat
sun-hat.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

sun-robe.name: Sun Robe
sun-robe.description: Magic attire imbued with solar energy.

sun-staff.name: Sun Staff
sun-staff.description: A staff imbued with celestial might.

super-empty-bottle.name: Super Empty Bottle
super-empty-bottle.description: A large bottle suitable for holding a brewed potion, tonic, or elixir. Visit a herbalist to fill this bottle.

super-exp-potion.name: Super EXP Potion
super-exp-potion.description: A sour tasting elixir that quadruples experience earned for a limited time.

surtrs-boots.name: Surtr's Boots
surtrs-boots.description: Footwear of Surtr, the wanderer. They grant their wearer additional dexterity and are well suited for adornment.

surtrs-cuirass.name: Surtr's Cuirass
surtrs-cuirass.description: Light armor of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional Ward and is well suited for adornment.

surtrs-helmet.name: Surtr's Helmet
surtrs-helmet.description: Helmet of Surtr, the wanderer. It grants its wearer additional HP and is well suited for adornment.

surtrs-shield.name: Surtr's Shield
surtrs-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

surtrs-sword.name: Surtr's Sword
surtrs-sword.description: The extremely bright, decorative sword of Surtr. It can easily blind an opponent and will draw more monsters towards you with its bright, everlasting light.

swansong.name: Swansong
swansong.description: Use both your magic and attack stats to cast the famous song of the Swansong.

symbol-of-doom.name: Symbol of Doom
symbol-of-doom.description: Adornment of the Final Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the action rate and stats of your follower.

symbol-of-famine.name: Symbol of Famine
symbol-of-famine.description: Adornment of the First Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will slightly protect one from status ailments.

symbol-of-pestilence.name: Symbol of Pestilence
symbol-of-pestilence.description: Adornment of the Second Horseman. Adorning it upon a piece of armor will moderately protect one from status ailments.

symbol-of-war.name: Symbol of War
symbol-of-war.description: Adornment of the Third Horseman. Adorning it upon a weapon will increase the distance that you can see.

taranis-hood.name: Taranis Hood
taranis-hood.description: Hood of an infamous Taranis of Stormforce.

tarnished-kings-crown.name: Tarnished King's Crown
tarnished-kings-crown.description: The broken crown of forgotten King Meliodas. Meliodas claimed rule after Gradlon had fallen, but many outright deny his kingship. Its dents and cracks make it well suited for adornment.

tattered-clothwrap.name: Tattered Clothwrap
tattered-clothwrap.description: A simple piece of cloth. It's quite old and musty.

tempest-boots.name: Tempest Boots
tempest-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the skies. Grants protection from lightning.

templar-shield.name: Templar Shield
templar-shield.description: The shield of a mighty templar knight. It provides extra physical defense.

terra-boots.name: Terra Boots
terra-boots.description: Great boots of a mage who controlled the ground below. Grants protection from earthen magic.

theta-achlys-riftlock.name: Theta Achlys Riftlock
theta-achlys-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Achlys, the Red Dagger.

theta-charon-riftlock.name: Theta Charon Riftlock
theta-charon-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Charon, the Grand Summoner.

theta-olympia-archistaff.name: Theta Olympia Archistaff
theta-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

theta-olympia-boots.name: Theta Olympia Boots
theta-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-cowl.name: Theta Olympia Cowl
theta-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-cuirass.name: Theta Olympia Cuirass
theta-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-garb.name: Theta Olympia Garb
theta-olympia-garb.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-greaves.name: Theta Olympia Greaves
theta-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-helmet.name: Theta Olympia Helmet
theta-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-hood.name: Theta Olympia Hood
theta-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-shoes.name: Theta Olympia Shoes
theta-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-vestment.name: Theta Olympia Vestment
theta-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

theta-olympia-warbow.name: Theta Olympia Warbow
theta-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

theta-olympia-warsword.name: Theta Olympia Warsword
theta-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

theta-rhada-riftlock.name: Theta Rhada Riftlock
theta-rhada-riftlock.description: Riftlock of Rhada, the Great Shield.

thieves-ring.name: Thieve's Ring
thieves-ring.description: Lucky ring worn by bandits. Increases gold earned.

third-horsemans-armor.name: Third Horseman's Armor
third-horsemans-armor.description: Armor of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

third-horsemans-boots.name: Third Horseman's Boots
third-horsemans-boots.description: Boots of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

third-horsemans-cloak.name: Third Horseman's Cloak
third-horsemans-cloak.description: Cloak of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

third-horsemans-gada.name: Third Horseman's Gada
third-horsemans-gada.description: Blunt weapon of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses and can easily stun or decrease the dexterity of an opponent.

third-horsemans-hood.name: Third Horseman's Hood
third-horsemans-hood.description: Hood of the Third Horseman, often associated with unwavering war. It reduces the damage taken from the ultimate attacks of Raid Bosses.

thorn.name: Thorn
thorn.description: Prickly blade of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Prickly blades of a woodland creature. It has a small chance to poison an opponent.

thors-arc.name: Thor's Arc
thors-arc.description: A masterfully crafted magical bow of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His bow can easily paralyze an opponent.

thors-hammer.name: Thor's Hammer
thors-hammer.description: Small, yet immensely heavy hammer of Thor. Thor founded the Stormforce shortly before succumbing to the power of the falling. His hammer can easily paralyze an opponent.

titan-armor.name: Titan Armor
titan-armor.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

titan-axe.name: Titan Axe
titan-axe.description: An azure axe crafted of hard titanium.

titan-helmet.name: Titan Helmet
titan-helmet.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

titan-leggings.name: Titan Leggings
titan-leggings.description: Azure armor crafted of hard titanium.

titanium.name: Titanium
titanium.description: A large chunk of hardened titanium. Useful in upgrading powerful equipment.

tizona.name: Tizona
tizona.description: A greatsword often used in defensive swordplay by the almighty knight, Balin. Strikes of the sword have the ability to lower an opponent's physical or magical defenses.

top-hat.name: Top Hat
top-hat.description: Boy, it is dapper! When wearing this hat, you can wield two-handed weapons more effectively.

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: Use it at night to increase visibility. You may attract more monsters as well.

tower-core.name: Tower Core
tower-core.description: The foundation needed to build a Tower of Olympia atop of.

tower-plane.name: Tower Plane
tower-plane.description: A supporting piece of material used by the Titans to construct towers to the stars. Planes are required to construct every floor of a tower.

tower-shard.name: Tower Shard
tower-shard.description: A piece of material used by the Titans to construct towers to the stars.

tower-shield.name: Tower Shield
tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

treecutter.name: Treecutter
treecutter.description: Take the stance of Gymir, increasing your attack power, but taking damage every turn.

trevelyans-archistaff.name: Trevelyan's Archistaff
trevelyans-archistaff.description: Unstable elementless magic that can blind an opponent while dealing damage thrice.

trevelyans-charm.name: Trevelyan's Charm
trevelyans-charm.description: Amulet carried by Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will increase your offensive power when carrying a weapon with both hands.

trevelyans-hood.name: Trevelyan's Hood
trevelyans-hood.description: Hood of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

trevelyans-robe.name: Trevelyan's Robe
trevelyans-robe.description: Robe of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing it will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

trevelyans-shoes.name: Trevelyan's Shoes
trevelyans-shoes.description: Shoes of Trevelyan, the storied Lyonesse Warlock. Wearing them will slightly decrease the mana required for spells while protecting one from the arcane arts.

trialing-axe.name: Trialing Axe
trialing-axe.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

trialing-bow.name: Trialing Bow
trialing-bow.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

trialing-staff.name: Trialing Staff
trialing-staff.description: Deals dragon damage and potentially causes blight.

trolls-charm.name: Troll's Charm
trolls-charm.description: Strange amulet of a troll. Boosts most stats.

tundric-katana.name: Tundric Katana
tundric-katana.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

tundric-staff.name: Tundric Staff
tundric-staff.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

tundric-sword.name: Tundric Sword
tundric-sword.description: A highly decorative weapon wielded by Elven warriors of the North. It boasts extra adornment slots.

turul-feather.name: Turul Feather
turul-feather.description: The feather of a Turul. It can grant a piece of armor additional dexterity when adorned upon it.

twilight-blade.name: Twilight Blade
twilight-blade.description: Blade of the wandering twilight knights. Its thick obsidian blade is infused with the power of darkness and may cause an opponent to fall asleep.

twilightstone.name: Twilightstone
twilightstone.description: A hard obsidian stone that resembles an empty night sky.

undead-bone.name: Undead Bone
undead-bone.description: Bones of the undead can rarely be so strong.

unfelled-concord.name: Unfelled Concord
unfelled-concord.description: A large garnet that symbolizes one's allegiance to the Order of the Unfelled. Wearing this gem will allow one to enter dungeons found in the world more frequently.

untamed-bull.name: Untamed Bull
untamed-bull.description: The powerful, fiery staff of Cerus, the untamed bull.

untamed-bulls-eye.name: Untamed Bull's Eye
untamed-bulls-eye.description: A celestial adornment capable of increasing many attributes of a piece of equipment when adorned upon it.

vajra.name: Vajra
vajra.description: A powerful weapon of rain and thunder. Contains the power of lightning and may paralyze an opponent.

valhallan-shield.name: Valhallan Shield
valhallan-shield.description: Shield carried by valkyries of the Northern lands. It protects one from the cold.

valhallas-rise.name: Valhalla's Rise
valhallas-rise.description: A rare blade carried by the most gifted of Nothren valkyries. It may grant one the stance of Gunnr, raising attack power but lowering defenses.

vampiric-blade.name: Vampiric Blade
vampiric-blade.description: An evil blade wielded by experienced vampires. Attacks with this weapon can slightly restore HP.

vampiric-ore.name: Vampiric Ore
vampiric-ore.description: Ore seemingly treasured by the lords of the night. This can be used to upgrade weapons of theirs.

vandals-veil.name: Vandal's Veil
vandals-veil.description: A thick piece of fabric, often used to protect one's lungs. Wearing it makes one less likely to be afflicted with status effects.

venin.name: Venin
venin.description: Putrid spear of the Rat King. It may cause poison while slightly boosting experience and orns earned.

verricks-ring.name: Verrick's Ring
verricks-ring.description: Lunar Catalyst of Verrick, fallen king of the Enlightened.

viper-armor.name: Viper Armor
viper-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.

viper-boots.name: Viper Boots
viper-boots.description: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.

viper-chestmail.name: Viper Chestmail
viper-chestmail.description: An exotic chest guard made of guivre skin.

viper-cowl.name: Viper Cowl
viper-cowl.description: An exotic cowl made of guivre skin.

viper-dagger.name: Viper Dagger
viper-dagger.description: A fine blade crafted of a great dragon's talon

viper-helmet.name: Viper Helmet
viper-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of guivre skin.

viper-hood.name: Viper Hood
viper-hood.description: An exotic hood made of guivre skin.

viper-leggings.name: Viper Leggings
viper-leggings.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of guivre skin.

viper-mages-boots.name: Viper Mage's Boots
viper-mages-boots.description: Exotic boots made of guivre skin.

viper-robe.name: Viper Robe
viper-robe.description: An exotic robe made of guivre skin.

vipersong.name: Vipersong
vipersong.description: An instrument often used to sooth the greatest of dragons. Its song has the rare chance to temporarily give useful statuses.

vritra-charm.name: Vritra Charm
vritra-charm.description: Chapter III: Vritra was next to forge these lands, laying her immutable wings upon the coiled rock. This formed a basin of strength for life to grow atop the molten core of this planet. Her charm may occasionally protect you from status effects while granting immunity to Paralyze, Stun, and Petrification.

vulcan-boots.name: Vulcan Boots
vulcan-boots.description: Footwear of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

vulcan-buckler.name: Vulcan Buckler
vulcan-buckler.description: Buckler of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

vulcan-charm.name: Vulcan Charm
vulcan-charm.description: A yellow crystal carried by Vulcan, the Red Knight. It increases magic power and mana when carried.

vulcan-cuirass.name: Vulcan Cuirass
vulcan-cuirass.description: Armor of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

vulcan-helmet.name: Vulcan Helmet
vulcan-helmet.description: Helmet of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

vulcans-archistaff.name: Vulcan's Archistaff
vulcans-archistaff.description: An embered Archistaff seldom wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His staff can easily burn an opponent.

vulcans-brew.name: Vulcan's Brew
vulcans-brew.description: A strong tonic brewed by Vulcan of the Inferno Knights. Consume it to slightly raise experience and items dropped for a limited time.

vulcans-longsword.name: Vulcan's Longsword
vulcans-longsword.description: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn. His blade can easily burn an opponent.

wading-boots.name: Wading Boots
wading-boots.description: Shoes made to navigate thick marshland.

waistguard-of-cerus.name: Waistguard of Cerus
waistguard-of-cerus.description: Enchanted belt of Cerus, the untamed. It protects one from burning while granting additional HP.

waking-pendant.name: Waking Pendant
waking-pendant.description: A magical pendant utilized by studious scholars. It prevents its wearer from falling asleep.

war-blinders.name: War Blinders
war-blinders.description: Blinders often used to quell a wild horse's restlessness. They increase dexterity and critical hit rate of those granted with extra concentration.

war-mage-armor.name: War-mage Armor
war-mage-armor.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the armor of one.

war-mage-boots.name: War-mage Boots
war-mage-boots.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. These are the boots of one.

war-mage-helmet.name: War-mage Helmet
war-mage-helmet.description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.

warlock-hat.name: Warlock Hat
warlock-hat.description: A large hat of a wise warlock.

warlock-staff.name: Warlock Staff
warlock-staff.description: An oddly green staff, seemingly owned by a wise warlock.

was.name: Was
was.description: A symbol of control over the force of chaos. It is well suited for adornment.

waterstone.name: Waterstone
waterstone.description: A rare piece of waterstone. Useful for crafting and upgrading magical weapons or armor.

whetstone.name: Whetstone
whetstone.description: A stone of quartz often used in the sharpening of blades. Using it will freely upgrade your equipped weapon to level 2.

whisper.name: Whisper
whisper.description: Wait one turn, then return an opponent's attack back at them.

willow-tree-branch.name: Willow Tree Branch
willow-tree-branch.description: Take the stance of Eistla, greatly increasing hybrid offensive ability at the expense of your follower or summons' prowess.

wintara-crested-shield.name: Wintara Crested Shield
wintara-crested-shield.description: Shield of Fomor, Cursed King of Fomoria. This item grants a number of passive abilities known to be utilized by the Fomorian houses.

wisp-staff.name: Wisp Staff
wisp-staff.description: Staff imbued with the power of a wisp.

witchs-archistaff.name: Witch's Archistaff
witchs-archistaff.description: Old, decrepit, dark archistaff of a powerful witch. Slightly boosts experience earned.

witchs-hat.name: Witch's Hat
witchs-hat.description: The symbolic headwear of Carman, the banished witch.

witchstone.name: Witchstone
witchstone.description: A strange stone crafted by a great witch.

wolfbane.name: Wolfbane
wolfbane.description: A magical blade representing the unrelenting force of Fenrir the wolf. It can temporarily decrease your opponent's defense upon use.

wolfs-blood.name: Wolf's Blood
wolfs-blood.description: What a strange substance. What could it ever be for?

wolfskin.name: Wolfskin
wolfskin.description: Light armor crafted of a wolf's remains.

wolven-tower-shield.name: Wolven Tower Shield
wolven-tower-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 4 turns.

wood.name: Wood
wood.description: A solid piece of wood. Useful for crafting and upgrading weapons or armor.

woodblade.name: Woodblade
woodblade.description: A mystical sword made of hardened wood.

wooden-shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden-shield.description: A simple shield made of hardened wood.

wooden-staff.name: Wooden Staff
wooden-staff.description: A mage's staff crafted of enchanted wood.

woodland-staff.name: Woodland Staff
woodland-staff.description: A mystical staff made of hardened wood.

world-eater.name: World Eater
world-eater.description: Chapter VIII: Bashe, the World Eater -- hungry as ever -- drove his mouth downwards, piercing the foundation of the Agathodaemon. His broadsword is filled with craters as well, making it well suitable for adornment.

wyvern-armor.name: Wyvern Armor
wyvern-armor.description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-blades.name: Wyvern Blades
wyvern-blades.description: Swiftly attack twice, dealing up to double damage and drenching an opponent.

wyvern-boots.name: Wyvern Boots
wyvern-boots.description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-chestmail.name: Wyvern Chestmail
wyvern-chestmail.description: An exotic chest guard made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-cowl.name: Wyvern Cowl
wyvern-cowl.description: An exotic cowl made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-helmet.name: Wyvern Helmet
wyvern-helmet.description: An exotic helmet made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-hood.name: Wyvern Hood
wyvern-hood.description: An exotic hood made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-leggings.name: Wyvern Leggings
wyvern-leggings.description: Exotic, heavy leg armor made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-mages-boots.name: Wyvern Mage's Boots
wyvern-mages-boots.description: Exotic boots made of wyvern skin.

wyvern-robe.name: Wyvern Robe
wyvern-robe.description: An exotic robe made of wyvern skin.

xi-olympia-archistaff.name: Xi Olympia Archistaff
xi-olympia-archistaff.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

xi-olympia-boots.name: Xi Olympia Boots
xi-olympia-boots.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-cowl.name: Xi Olympia Cowl
xi-olympia-cowl.description: Light armor, reminiscent of an Olympian rogue. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-cuirass.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-greaves.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-helmet.name: Xi Olympia Helmet
xi-olympia-helmet.description: Heavy armor, reminiscent of an Olympian warrior. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-hood.name: Xi Olympia Hood
xi-olympia-hood.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-shoes.name: Xi Olympia Shoes
xi-olympia-shoes.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-vestment.name: Xi Olympia Vestment
xi-olympia-vestment.description: Magical clothing, reminiscent of an Olympian magician. Zeus personally trained thousands of warriors of all tiers, perfecting an art of combat that allowed one to find additional favor in battle while protecting one's own prowess.

xi-olympia-warbow.name: Xi Olympia Warbow
xi-olympia-warbow.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

xi-olympia-warsword.name: Xi Olympia Warsword
xi-olympia-warsword.description: Rare weapon, fallen from an Olympian.

yellow-eye-of-kerberos.name: Yellow Eye of Kerberos
yellow-eye-of-kerberos.description: Crystallized eye of the Kerberos. It grants a high chance to paralyze an opponent.

yeti-coat.name: Yeti Coat
yeti-coat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

yeti-mightycoat.name: Yeti Mightycoat
yeti-mightycoat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

yeti-overcoat.name: Yeti Overcoat
yeti-overcoat.description: Coat reminiscent of the formidable Yeti. It protects one from the snow and from having their defenses lowered.

ymir-agathodaemon-hammer.name: Ymir Agathodaemon Hammer
ymir-agathodaemon-hammer.description: Deals extra damage and may stun an opponent.

ymir-brilliant-feathers.name: Ymir Brilliant Feathers
ymir-brilliant-feathers.description: Deals extra damage and may cause bleeding.

ymir-cliffside-cuirass.name: Ymir Cliffside Cuirass
ymir-cliffside-cuirass.description: Chapter VI: Illuyanka then raised walls of stone to frame this new land from the raging seas and winds. The cliffs and shores can be seen from afar, and her mighty armor will surely make one feel as they are made of the cliffs themselves. It will occasionally protect you from hits that take 100% of your maximum HP.

ymir-coiled-shield.name: Ymir Coiled Shield
ymir-coiled-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 3 turns.

ymir-staff-of-zaltys.name: Ymir Staff of Zaltys
ymir-staff-of-zaltys.description: Chapter V: Zaltys never did like the Agathodaemon, but understood that she needed the soil for life. Zaltys laid seed to the soil, sprouting the foliage that lets us breath our air. Her staff represents life, and will allow you to recover HP each turn in battle.

ymir-vritra-charm.name: Ymir Vritra Charm
ymir-vritra-charm.description: Chapter III: Vritra was next to forge these lands, laying her immutable wings upon the coiled rock. This formed a basin of strength for life to grow atop the molten core of this planet. Her charm may occasionally protect you from status effects while granting immunity to Paralyze, Stun, and Petrification.

ymir-world-eater.name: Ymir World Eater
ymir-world-eater.description: Chapter VIII: Bashe, the World Eater -- hungry as ever -- drove his mouth downwards, piercing the foundation of the Agathodaemon. His broadsword is filled with craters as well, making it well suitable for adornment.

yokais-staff.name: Yokai's Staff
yokais-staff.description: A staff of the revered Yokai. It may lower an opponent's magical defenses.

zeta-myrddin-cloak.name: Zeta Myrddin Cloak
zeta-myrddin-cloak.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

zeta-myrddin-cowl.name: Zeta Myrddin Cowl
zeta-myrddin-cowl.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

zeta-myrddin-hood.name: Zeta Myrddin Hood
zeta-myrddin-hood.description: One of the notoriously recognizable hoods of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer.

zeta-myrddin-robe.name: Zeta Myrddin Robe
zeta-myrddin-robe.description: One of the notoriously recognizable robes of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. It can protect its wearer from having their resistance lowered.

zeta-myrddin-shield.name: Zeta Myrddin Shield
zeta-myrddin-shield.description: Grants temporary defenses and grants Ward for 5 turns.

zeta-myrddin.name: Zeta Myrddin
zeta-myrddin.description: One of the notoriously recognizable archistaves of Merlin, the famed Avalon sorcerer. Spells cast by this staff can occasionally lower an opponent's defenses.

zeta-olympia-archistaff.name: Zeta Olympia Archistaff

warg.name: Warg

wolf.name: Wolf

ymir-amphiptere.name: Ymir Amphiptere
ymir-amphiptere.description: The Great Dragons will bring many skills to battle. Available for a limited time only.

yokai.name: Yokai
yokai.description: The storied Yokai is a master of sleep and that of nightmares.

zaltys-friendly-one.name: Zaltys, Friendly One

zu.name: Zu
zu.description: A tamed Zu. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.

age-old-mimic.name: Age-Old Mimic

almighty-balin.name: Almighty Balin
almighty-balin.description:
From Avalon comes the Knight with Two Swords.

One blade of attack, one of ward.

arisen-asteria-of-olympia.name: Arisen Asteria of Olympia

arisen-atlas-of-olympia.name: Arisen Atlas of Olympia
arisen-atlas-of-olympia.description: Rumored to have lifted a world worth of stone up to the skies, Atlas's strength could not be rivaled.

arisen-balin.name: Arisen Balin
arisen-balin.description:
From Avalon comes the Knight with Two Swords.

One blade of attack, one of ward.

arisen-cade.description: Cade, the famed inventor of Avalon, was well renowned for the esoteric gadgets he produced. Perhaps he has been working on something new?

arisen-ebon-scruug.name: Arisen Ebon Scruug
arisen-ebon-scruug.description: An apparition of greed and envy. Once a year, the dreaded Scruug returns from the Underworld with the goal to destroy all happiness.

arisen-hel.name: Arisen Hel
arisen-hel.description:
With resolution
and without remorse
I will gladly
await my own.

Achlys, the Red Dagger.
Judge of the Rift.

Charon, the Grand Summoner.
Judge of the Rift.

arisen-judge-rhada.name: Arisen Judge Rhada

Rhada, the Great Shield.
Judge of the Rift.

arisen-morrigan.name: Arisen Morrigan

Surtr moves from the south.
With the scathe of branches.

The sun of Gods of the Slain.

asteria-of-olympia.name: Asteria of Olympia

Judge of the Rift.

Appointed by a Balor king, he is a master in creating illness.

hel.name: Hel

With resolution
and without remorse
I will gladly
await my own.

phoenix.name: Phoenix
phoenix.description: From the ashes, it has risen.

Surtr moves from the south.
With the scathe of branches.
There shines from his sword.
The sun of Gods of the Slain.

A great witch of curse and plague, Morrigan was the only being to defeat Apollyon as he approached Lyonesse.

Be warned that this is a difficult foe and may not be suitable for the faint at heart.

anthem.description: Potentially boost attack, magic, defenses, and resistance while potentially decreasing opponent stats.
